MESSAGE.JP: ドが帰ってしまってから、僕は学食のテレビを毎朝見るのが日課となってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Ever since Kud had left, I watched the TV news programs in the cafeteria every day.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ever since Kud had left, I watched the TV news programs in the cafeteria every day.

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…未知の疫病の流行が噂されており、海上封鎖の強化が求められ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...They are demanding a further tightening of the sea blockade due to rumors of an unknown plague spreading...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...They are demanding a further tightening of the sea blockade due to rumors of an unknown plague spreading...❞

MESSAGE.JP: く流されるそれは一日が終わるころにも同じように悪いニュースだけを伝えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: In the evening news program, there wasn't any good news regarding Tevua whatsoever, nor in the morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the evening news program, there wasn't any good news regarding Tevua whatsoever, nor in the morning.

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…なお、暴徒集団の一部が空港周辺に侵入したため、国連軍は空爆を実施…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...The UN force carried out a raid against a party of rioters that broke into the airport, and...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...The UN force carried out a raid against a party of rioters that broke into the airport, and...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 助活動は、空港の損壊と同時に打ち切られた。
MESSAGE.EN: Because of that, the rescue work had all been halted.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because of that, the rescue work had all been halted.

MESSAGE.JP: 況が良くなることはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: The situation hadn't gotten any better.
MESSAGE.Translation: The situation hadn't gotten any better.

MESSAGE.JP: はテレビ越しに見ていることしか出来ない。
MESSAGE.EN: All I could do was keep checking out the information provided by media.
MESSAGE.Translation: All I could do was keep checking out the information provided by media.

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…現地のラジオ局は非常用電源の燃料が尽き次第放送の終了を予告して…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...The local radio station announced that they will stop broadcasting soon, as they are running out of emergency power...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...The local radio station announced that they will stop broadcasting soon, as they are running out of emergency power...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朝。
MESSAGE.EN: Early in the morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: Early in the morning.

MESSAGE.JP: 星ニュースだけはやっているのでチャンネルをつける。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned to a satellite-television news channel which was broadcasting even at this hour.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned to a satellite-television news channel which was broadcasting even at this hour.

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…連邦崩壊の混乱で放棄され、独立を余儀なくされたとはいえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...Even though Tevua was abandoned after the collapse of the Union, and they had to go independent,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...Even though Tevua was abandoned after the collapse of the Union, and they had to go independent,❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「一産業への過度の投資それに伴う依存構造の問題点…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝it was obviously a big mistake that they invested so heavily into their space industry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝it was obviously a big mistake that they invested so heavily into their space industry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…国策の失敗は明白と言えます…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...and they built up a dependence structure within themselves...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...and they built up a dependence structure within themselves...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…関連国営企業における出資割合は、欧米露系資本を合わせて５割」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...National companies from the US, Europe and Russia bear 50% of the financial contribution to the industry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...National companies from the US, Europe and Russia bear 50% of the financial contribution to the industry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「残りをアジア系とオーストロネシア系で分けており…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝And the rest is divided between Asian and Austronesian groups...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝And the rest is divided between Asian and Austronesian groups...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 字型のテロップには『詳細がわかり次第続報をお送りします』としか書いていない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Written on the L-shaped caption was simply ❛Further news will be reported as soon as it is received❜...
MESSAGE.Translation: Written on the L-shaped caption was simply ❛Further news will be reported as soon as it is received❜...

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「衛星画像によるといくつもの炎が確認されるだけで詳細不明のままで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝As for now, we have only received satellite pictures of a dozen fires in the area...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝As for now, we have only received satellite pictures of a dozen fires in the area...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 絡を取る手段は僕には何もない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no way to get in contact with Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no way to get in contact with Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: レビが伝える内容と、テーブルの上にあるわかめの味噌汁との落差に非現実感を覚えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking down at my breakfast on the table, I couldn't believe the content streaming in from the TV was all real.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking down at my breakfast on the table, I couldn't believe the content streaming in from the TV was all real.

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…現地政府機関はこの人為的大災害に対応出来ていないと思われ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...It appears that the government organizations on-site can not do anything about these human created disasters...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...It appears that the government organizations on-site can not do anything about these human created disasters...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…近隣諸国からの難民の問題が発生…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...As a result, riots have broken out in several neighboring countries...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...As a result, riots have broken out in several neighboring countries...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…国連軍は第三次空爆を実施…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...The UN force carried out their third air-strike...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...The UN force carried out their third air-strike...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…現地に最後まで残った特派員が衛星経由で送ってきた内容によりますと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...According to reports sent via satellite by our special correspondent, who remained on scene until the last minute...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...According to reports sent via satellite by our special correspondent, who remained on scene until the last minute...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「暴徒は災害の引き金となった航空宇宙局関係者をはじめ、政府関係者を公開処刑しはじめたとの報道が…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝The insurgents have begun publicly executing the aviation staff and government officials...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝The insurgents have begun publicly executing the aviation staff and government officials...❞

MESSAGE.JP: たん。
MESSAGE.EN: *Bang.*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bang.*

MESSAGE.JP: は椅子から立ち上がった。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood up from my chair.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood up from my chair.

MESSAGE.JP: 、なんて？　なんて言ったのだ？　ニュースキャスターは。
MESSAGE.EN: What is this? What is the news anchor talking about?
MESSAGE.Translation: What is this? What is the news anchor talking about?

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「『外島人と内島人との対立が非常時に露呈した、ということではないかと』」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝❛It is thought that this happened because the crisis brought to surface the conflict between the out-islanders and in-islanders.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝❛It is thought that this happened because the crisis brought to surface the conflict between the out-islanders and in-islanders.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 帯の着信音。
MESSAGE.EN: My cellphone beeped.
MESSAGE.Translation: My cellphone beeped.

MESSAGE.JP: てて携帯を開く。
MESSAGE.EN: I quickly opened it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I quickly opened it.

MESSAGE.JP: はろー、リキ。届いていますか？』
MESSAGE.EN: [Haro-, Riki. Did you get this mail?]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Haro-, Riki. Did you get this mail?]

MESSAGE.JP: は慌てて返信をする。
MESSAGE.EN: I texted her back quickly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I texted her back quickly.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（良かった…！　クドは無事みたいだ…！）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Thank god...! Looks like she's safe...!)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Thank god...! Looks like she's safe...!)

MESSAGE.JP: ド、大丈夫？　無事だったの？
MESSAGE.EN: [Kud, are you okay? Are you safe?]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Kud, are you okay? Are you safe?]

MESSAGE.JP: ールを慌てて送ったけれど、その返信が来たのは翌日だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Although I expected she'd reply to me any time soon, I ended up having to wait until the next day.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although I expected she'd reply to me any time soon, I ended up having to wait until the next day.

MESSAGE.JP: をまたいでのやりとりが続く…
MESSAGE.EN: However, it was not just that one time; every reply from her took one day to reach me.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, it was not just that one time; every reply from her took one day to reach me.

MESSAGE.JP: ごめんなさい、リキ。送信制限があるのです』
MESSAGE.EN: [I'm sorry, Riki, but messaging from here is restricted.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [I'm sorry, Riki, but messaging from here is restricted.]

MESSAGE.JP: 一度は逃げた故郷の島。
MESSAGE.EN: ...My home island that I ran away from once.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...My home island that I ran away from once.

MESSAGE.JP: こはテレビで見たとおりの光景だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked just like on TV.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked just like on TV.

MESSAGE.JP: 憶にあるとおりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was just like in my memories.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was just like in my memories.

MESSAGE.JP: 安になる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was worried.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was worried.

MESSAGE.JP: だ全部思い出せていない。
MESSAGE.EN: I still couldn't remember everything.
MESSAGE.Translation: I still couldn't remember everything.

MESSAGE.JP: は、やり直せるでしょうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if I can start over...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if I can start over...

MESSAGE.JP: 帯のメールを、リキに送る。
MESSAGE.EN: I sent a text to Riki.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sent a text to Riki.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 事がくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I got a reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got a reply.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキ……」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki......❞

MESSAGE.JP: ールのやりとりができるのはどうしてだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Why could we exchange texts?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why could we exchange texts?

MESSAGE.JP: 由は私にもわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no idea.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no idea.

MESSAGE.JP: キと繋がりをまだ望んでいる、私のわがまま。
MESSAGE.EN: I was selfish and wanted to stay connected to Riki.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was selfish and wanted to stay connected to Riki.

MESSAGE.JP: れを、誰かが許してくれているのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Was somebody granting me that selfishness?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was somebody granting me that selfishness?

MESSAGE.JP: …色々たいへんです。私もおてつだいをしています』
MESSAGE.EN: [...Things are very tough here. I'm helping as well.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [...Things are very tough here. I'm helping as well.]

MESSAGE.JP: 私はだいじょうぶです。いまのところは、ですが』
MESSAGE.EN: [I'm all right... for now.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [I'm all right... for now.]

MESSAGE.JP: ひどい災害地で、私ができることなんて、何もない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...There was nothing I could do in areas with such huge fire damage.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There was nothing I could do in areas with such huge fire damage.

MESSAGE.JP: んなのわかってた。
MESSAGE.EN: I knew that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I knew that.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも、できることをしよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: But I still wanted to do what I could...
MESSAGE.Translation: But I still wanted to do what I could...

MESSAGE.JP: きることが、あるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There had to be something I could do.
MESSAGE.Translation: There had to be something I could do.

MESSAGE.JP: ストレルカたちは元気ですか？』
MESSAGE.EN: [Are Strelka and Belka doing well?]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Are Strelka and Belka doing well?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴さんにお礼を言っておいてください』
MESSAGE.EN: [Can you give Rin-san my thanks for taking care of them?]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Can you give Rin-san my thanks for taking care of them?]

MESSAGE.JP: 宅に立ち寄った。
MESSAGE.EN: I stopped by my house.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stopped by my house.

MESSAGE.JP: くさんいた犬たちがいない。
MESSAGE.EN: All of the dogs were gone.
MESSAGE.Translation: All of the dogs were gone.

MESSAGE.JP: つからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't find them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't find them.

MESSAGE.JP: こにもいない。
MESSAGE.EN: They were nowhere to be found.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were nowhere to be found.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@（…わかってます。見つからないのは、きっと…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@(...I know. There's no way I'll find them...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@(...I know. There's no way I'll find them...)

MESSAGE.JP: トレルカに会いたい。
MESSAGE.EN: I miss Strelka.
MESSAGE.Translation: I miss Strelka.

MESSAGE.JP: ェルカに会いたい。
MESSAGE.EN: I miss Belka.
MESSAGE.Translation: I miss Belka.

MESSAGE.JP: う、会えないのなら…あと少しだけ、あの子たちを撫でてあげたかった…。
MESSAGE.EN: I may not see them again... I wish I could have petted them some more...
MESSAGE.Translation: I may not see them again... I wish I could have petted them some more...

MESSAGE.JP: ほうそうきょくのあんてながこわされたみたいです…』
MESSAGE.EN: [It seems like they broke the antenna on the broadcast station...]
MESSAGE.Translation: [It seems like they broke the antenna on the broadcast station...]

MESSAGE.JP: 慣れたアンテナ塔。
MESSAGE.EN: I had gotten used to seeing the antenna tower.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had gotten used to seeing the antenna tower.

MESSAGE.JP: れが爆破されるのを見た。
MESSAGE.EN: Now it was destroyed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now it was destroyed.

MESSAGE.JP: レビで見たとおりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like I saw on TV.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like I saw on TV.

MESSAGE.JP: れが出来たとき、みんな喜んでいたのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone was happy when it was put up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone was happy when it was put up.

MESSAGE.JP: のどこにいたって電話が通じるって、喜んでいたのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: They had been happy because they could make calls from anywhere on the island...
MESSAGE.Translation: They had been happy because they could make calls from anywhere on the island...

MESSAGE.JP: ごはんないです』
MESSAGE.EN: [We ran out of food.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [We ran out of food.]

MESSAGE.JP: こういうときこそかんそうこんぶのでばんですね』
MESSAGE.EN: [This is exactly when dried kombu comes in handy.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [This is exactly when dried kombu comes in handy.]

MESSAGE.JP: こでもお腹は空く。
MESSAGE.EN: Even here I was hungry.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even here I was hungry.

MESSAGE.JP: かしなことだったけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: It was weird.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was weird.

MESSAGE.JP: もきっと、お腹が空くと決まっているからそうなんだろうと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: But it was pretty obvious that I'd get hungry.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it was pretty obvious that I'd get hungry.

MESSAGE.JP: んな元気がない。
MESSAGE.EN: No-one here was doing well.
MESSAGE.Translation: No-one here was doing well.

MESSAGE.JP: レビで見たとおりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like I saw on TV.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like I saw on TV.

MESSAGE.JP: おかあさんが…みつかりました！』
MESSAGE.EN: [My mother... she's been found!]
MESSAGE.Translation: [My mother... she's been found!]

MESSAGE.JP: けんきゅうしょのひとたちと、あいにいってきます』
MESSAGE.EN: [I'm going to go and meet the institute members.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [I'm going to go and meet the institute members.]

MESSAGE.JP: 国立ナノチューブ研究所のひとからそれを聞いた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I heard that from someone who works at the National Nanotube Research Facility.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I heard that from someone who works at the National Nanotube Research Facility.

MESSAGE.JP: のひとと会うのも久しぶりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I hadn't met them in a long time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hadn't met them in a long time.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@（日本の大学から来た先生でしたか…？　記憶があやふやです…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@(Were they a teacher who came from a Japanese university...? I can't really remember.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@(Were they a teacher who came from a Japanese university...? I can't really remember.)

MESSAGE.JP: は、嬉しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was happy.

MESSAGE.JP: う会えないと思っていた、おかあさん。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't think I'd be able to see you again, Mother.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't think I'd be able to see you again, Mother.

MESSAGE.JP: ったとき、どう言おう。
MESSAGE.EN: What should I say when I see you?
MESSAGE.Translation: What should I say when I see you?

MESSAGE.JP: う謝ろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I should apologize.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should apologize.

MESSAGE.JP: ればかり、考えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: That's all I could think of.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's all I could think of.

MESSAGE.JP: 日かけて準備が出来た。
MESSAGE.EN: Preparations were done a few days later.
MESSAGE.Translation: Preparations were done a few days later.

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「…よく社の施設に身柄を運び込めたものだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝...We managed to get her into the company facilities.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝...We managed to get her into the company facilities.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 所員@「セーフティボックスが奇跡的に作動したのだと思われます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff@❝It's a miracle the safety box worked.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff@❝It's a miracle the safety box worked.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「クーニャ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝Kunya.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝Kunya.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「は、はい。おじい様」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Y-yes, Grandfather?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Y-yes, Grandfather?❞

MESSAGE.JP: じい様が手渡そうとしたもの。
MESSAGE.EN: Grandfather handed me something.
MESSAGE.Translation: Grandfather handed me something.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…っ」
。その側面に『Lady Smith』と彫られている。
MESSAGE.EN: A gun. ❛Lady Smith❜ was engraved on the side.
MESSAGE.Translation: A gun. ❛Lady Smith❜ was engraved on the side.

MESSAGE.JP: れただけでもぞっとするほど冷たい金属のかたまり…。
MESSAGE.EN: That lump of metal was cold enough to make me shiver from just touching it...
MESSAGE.Translation: That lump of metal was cold enough to make me shiver from just touching it...

MESSAGE.JP: を振る。
MESSAGE.EN: I shook my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shook my head.

MESSAGE.JP: 宅でも…護身用に、と渡されていた銃。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a gun for self defense... even in my own home.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a gun for self defense... even in my own home.

MESSAGE.JP: ったこともなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd never held one.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd never held one.

MESSAGE.JP: りたくなかったから。
MESSAGE.EN: Because I didn't want to touch one.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because I didn't want to touch one.

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「クーニャ。情勢はわかっているね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝Kunya, do you understand what's going on?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝Kunya, do you understand what's going on?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「持ちなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝Take it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝Take it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: を何度も振った。
MESSAGE.EN: I kept shaking my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I kept shaking my head.

MESSAGE.JP: やだった。
MESSAGE.EN: No way.
MESSAGE.Translation: No way.

MESSAGE.JP: んなの、いやだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There was just no way.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was just no way.

MESSAGE.JP: これ』はひとを傷つけるための道具だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛This❜ was a tool for hurting people.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛This❜ was a tool for hurting people.

MESSAGE.JP: んな道具を持つぐらいなら、撃たれるほうがましだ…！
MESSAGE.EN: I'd rather be shot than use this thing...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd rather be shot than use this thing...

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「身を守るためだ。おまえのためなんだよ、クーニャ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝It's for protection. To keep you safe, Kunya.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝It's for protection. To keep you safe, Kunya.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は首を振る。
MESSAGE.EN: I shook my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shook my head.

MESSAGE.JP: いやだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...No way.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...No way.

MESSAGE.JP: なんか触りたくない。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't want to touch a gun.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't want to touch a gun.

MESSAGE.JP: は、自分を守るためじゃなくて――。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't need to protect myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't need to protect myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 所員@「イワン・セルゲイヴィチ（同志イワン）、その子を連れて行くのですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff@❝Ivan Sergeevich (Comrade Ivan), are you taking this kid with you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff@❝Ivan Sergeevich (Comrade Ivan), are you taking this kid with you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「銃が持てないならここにいなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝If you don't take the gun, you'll have to stay here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝If you don't take the gun, you'll have to stay here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…でも、おじい様！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...But Grandfather!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...But Grandfather!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「おまえは優しい子だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝You are such a kind child...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝You are such a kind child...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「けれど、外ではそんな優しさは無視される」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝But outside your kindness will be ignored.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝But outside your kindness will be ignored.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「あれも…おまえの母もそれをわかった上で飛んだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝Your mother understood that and flew anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝Your mother understood that and flew anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「その結末がこれだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝This is the result.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝This is the result.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 所員@「…まずいことになりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff@❝...It's gotten really bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff@❝...It's gotten really bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「どうした…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝What's wrong...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝What's wrong...❞

MESSAGE.JP: じい様の顔色が変わる。

MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝...No way... Did someone betray us?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝Oh god!❞

MESSAGE.JP: わかった。

MESSAGE.JP: だ、こわかった。

MESSAGE.JP: にはわからない。

MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't make it out.

MESSAGE.JP: が震える。

MESSAGE.Translation: Why am I doing this?

MESSAGE.EN: I hit 0 so it would connect to Riki's number right away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hit 0 so it would connect to Riki's number right away.

MESSAGE.JP: とり、と音がした。

MESSAGE.JP: が落ちる音。
MESSAGE.EN: The sound of a gun hitting the floor.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, why am I in a place like this?

MESSAGE.Translation: There had been no news at all that lightened my mood...

きなりおじい様に手を掴まれたかと思うと投げ飛ばされた。

MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝Kunya, get down!❞

MESSAGE.EN: Someone came into the room and stepped on the cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone came into the room and stepped on the cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: ってきたのは、おかあさんのお仕事の同僚さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The person was one of my mother's co-workers.
MESSAGE.Translation: The person was one of my mother's co-workers.

MESSAGE.JP: 覚えがある。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd seen her before.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd seen her before.

MESSAGE.JP: 憶にあるとおりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was just like in my memory.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was just like in my memory.

MESSAGE.JP: 前は…思い出せない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't remember her name.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't remember her name.

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「きみか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝Oh it's you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝Oh it's you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「イワン・セルゲイヴィチ、こちらでしたか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝Ivan Sergeevich. So this is where you were.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝Ivan Sergeevich. So this is where you were.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 宙飛行士候補のひとり…時期尚早を主張してたと聞いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She had been one of the astronaut candidates... and had insisted the launch was premature.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had been one of the astronaut candidates... and had insisted the launch was premature.

MESSAGE.JP: 画から降ろされた反対派のひと。
MESSAGE.EN: She was from the opposing faction that had dropped out of the project.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was from the opposing faction that had dropped out of the project.

MESSAGE.JP: レビでこのひとが叫び声をあげていたのを見た。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd seen her yelling on the TV.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd seen her yelling on the TV.

MESSAGE.JP: かあさんと計画をこきおろし、憎しみをぶつけている姿を。
MESSAGE.EN: She'd been denouncing Mother and the project and spouting hatred.
MESSAGE.Translation: She'd been denouncing Mother and the project and spouting hatred.

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「銃を下ろせ。我々が争う理由はない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝Drop the gun. There's no reason for us to fight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝Drop the gun. There's no reason for us to fight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「今回の打上げを強行した人間は罪を償うべきです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝The people who forced the launch must atone for their sins.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝The people who forced the launch must atone for their sins.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「外の怒っている人々は、それを願っている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝That's what the angry masses outside want.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝That's what the angry masses outside want.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「…斬り殺し埋めて穀物でも創造するつもりかね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝...Do you intend to kill us and use our bodies as fertilizer?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝...Do you intend to kill us and use our bodies as fertilizer?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「あなたたちはハイヌウェレかオオゲツの神にでも捧げられるがお似合いだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝You would make a great sacrifice to Hainuwele or Oogetsu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝You would make a great sacrifice to Hainuwele or Oogetsu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「ヴィチローク出身だったか、きみは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝Are you from Veterok?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝Are you from Veterok?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「きみの故郷の島が沈んだことさえ、打ち上げのせいにするのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝Your home island sank and you're blaming it on the launch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝Your home island sank and you're blaming it on the launch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「ナレアウにでも祈れば新しい島も出来るかもしれないのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝If you pray to Nareau he can probably make you a new island.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝If you pray to Nareau he can probably make you a new island.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「…これがなければ対策工事は間に合ったはずです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝...If not for the launch, the countermeasures would have been done in time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝...If not for the launch, the countermeasures would have been done in time.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝......❞

MESSAGE.JP: は銃を拾えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't pick up the gun.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't pick up the gun.

MESSAGE.JP: うわかっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I understood now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I understood now.

MESSAGE.JP: 全部』思い出した私。
MESSAGE.EN: I had remembered ❛everything.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I had remembered ❛everything.❜

MESSAGE.JP: どい状況で自分ができることなんか何一つなく…。
MESSAGE.EN: There was nothing I could do in such a horrible situation...
MESSAGE.Translation: There was nothing I could do in such a horrible situation...

MESSAGE.JP: そこから逃げ出した私は。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I ran away from it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I ran away from it.

MESSAGE.JP: り直す機会なんか訪れない、ということを。
MESSAGE.EN: There would be no do-overs.
MESSAGE.Translation: There would be no do-overs.

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「チルーシャはどこですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝Where is Cherusha?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝Where is Cherusha?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「きみに教える理由はない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝I have no reason to tell you that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝I have no reason to tell you that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「ライカ気取りの彼女に用があります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝We have a use for the Laika girl.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝We have a use for the Laika girl.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「らい…か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Lai... ka?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Lai... ka?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「あなたは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝You're...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝You're...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「クーニャ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝Kunya!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝Kunya!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「…驚いた。どういうこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝...Surprising. What's the meaning of this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝...Surprising. What's the meaning of this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「まがい物のライカ。何故ここにいるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝The fake Laika. Why is she here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝The fake Laika. Why is she here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「国費を無駄遣いした挙げ句、逃げた出来損ないが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝The failure that ran away after all that money was squandered on her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝The failure that ran away after all that money was squandered on her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「何故ここに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝Why is she here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝Why is she here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 口が私に向けられる。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned the gun on me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned the gun on me.

MESSAGE.JP: けなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't move.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't move.

MESSAGE.JP: のひとから向けられる視線。
MESSAGE.EN: She was staring at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was staring at me.

MESSAGE.JP: は動けなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was frozen stiff.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was frozen stiff.

MESSAGE.JP: ういわれて当然だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was only natural.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was only natural.

MESSAGE.JP: のひとの言う通り…帰ってくる前ずっと故郷で言われていたことだったから。
MESSAGE.EN: What she'd said... It was what they'd always said in my hometown before I came home.
MESSAGE.Translation: What she'd said... It was what they'd always said in my hometown before I came home.

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「あなたの親が招いた結果…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝This is your parents' fault...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝This is your parents' fault...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「夢や憧れで先走った結末はこうだったのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝The result of getting carried away with dreams and aspirations.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝The result of getting carried away with dreams and aspirations.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「償わなければならない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝She must repent.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝She must repent.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「災害を起こした誰かのせいで、こんなことになった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝Things are like this because of the disaster somebody caused.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝Things are like this because of the disaster somebody caused.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 祖父@「やめろ。この子に罪はない！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Grandfather@❝Stop it! This girl is innocent!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Grandfather@❝Stop it! This girl is innocent!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「…そうでしょうとも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝...Indeed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝...Indeed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「同じようにあなたたちも自分が悪くない、と言うつもりですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝Next, you will be telling me that neither are you at fault.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝Next, you will be telling me that neither are you at fault.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 口が震えている。
MESSAGE.EN: The gun barrel was shaking.
MESSAGE.Translation: The gun barrel was shaking.

MESSAGE.JP: のひとは腕を震わせながら、怒りを叫んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Her arm was shaking as she yelled angrily.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her arm was shaking as she yelled angrily.

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「沢山の犠牲を払ったのに、なお犠牲が必要だとでも？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝That even though there have already been so many sacrifices, more are necessary?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝That even though there have already been so many sacrifices, more are necessary?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「今に留まるだけでも何かを犠牲にしなければならない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝That even if you were to just stop now, something would still have to be sacrificed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝That even if you were to just stop now, something would still have to be sacrificed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「だったら進む必要なんかない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝If so, there's no need to continue.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝If so, there's no need to continue.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「おかあさんの…せいだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You said... it's mother's fault.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You said... it's mother's fault.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…ほん…と…なんですか…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Is... that... true?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Is... that... true?❞

MESSAGE.JP: うしてこんな事故が起きたのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Why did this kind of accident happen?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why did this kind of accident happen?

MESSAGE.JP: が悪かったのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Was it someone's fault?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was it someone's fault?

MESSAGE.JP: が責任を取るべきなのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Does someone need to take responsibility?
MESSAGE.Translation: Does someone need to take responsibility?

MESSAGE.JP: それとも…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Or maybe...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Or maybe...

MESSAGE.JP: も悪くなくて…責めるべきひとがいない。
MESSAGE.EN: Nobody did anything wrong... and nobody needs to be blamed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nobody did anything wrong... and nobody needs to be blamed.

MESSAGE.JP: ういうことだろうか…？
MESSAGE.EN: Is that how it is?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is that how it is?

MESSAGE.JP: も、答えてくれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Nobody answered.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nobody answered.

MESSAGE.JP: 然だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course.

MESSAGE.JP: えを私は知らない。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know the answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know the answer.

MESSAGE.JP: が悪かったのだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: Who messed up?
MESSAGE.Translation: Who messed up?

MESSAGE.JP: かに罪を着せなければ納得できなかったのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Can't they come to an agreement without laying blame?
MESSAGE.Translation: Can't they come to an agreement without laying blame?

MESSAGE.JP: も、答えてくれない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Nobody answered...
MESSAGE.Translation: Nobody answered...

MESSAGE.JP: はすぐに、おかあさんの同僚さんの手と手錠で繋がれる。
MESSAGE.EN: Soon I was connected to Mother's co-worker by handcuffs.
MESSAGE.Translation: Soon I was connected to Mother's co-worker by handcuffs.

MESSAGE.JP: じい様が、施設の人たちと一緒に、牢代わりの倉庫に閉じ込められてしまうのも、私は見ていることしかできなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Grandfather and the others were thrown into a storehouse being used as a jail. I could only watch.
MESSAGE.Translation: Grandfather and the others were thrown into a storehouse being used as a jail. I could only watch.

MESSAGE.JP: かあさんの同僚さんは私の手を引っ張っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Mother's co-worker pulled me by the hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Mother's co-worker pulled me by the hand.

MESSAGE.JP: は抵抗する気も起こらなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't feel like resisting.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't feel like resisting.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ごめんなさい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: のひとに、その言葉は届くわけもなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: My words didn't reach her.
MESSAGE.Translation: My words didn't reach her.

MESSAGE.JP: キに話したことを思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I remembered a conversation with Riki.
MESSAGE.Translation: I remembered a conversation with Riki.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『この風習は、元々、島に住んでいた人たちの風習なんです』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛This tradition belonged to the people who originally lived on the island.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛This tradition belonged to the people who originally lived on the island.❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『願うときはお願いの紋を書いて水に沈めたりするんですよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛When you make a wish, you draw a coat of arms for it and submerge it in water.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛When you make a wish, you draw a coat of arms for it and submerge it in water.❜

MESSAGE.JP: の洞窟は、祈るための場所だと聞いたことがある。
MESSAGE.EN: I've heard that this cave was one place they prayed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I've heard that this cave was one place they prayed.

MESSAGE.JP: の女神にならって女性しか入れない場所。
MESSAGE.EN: Only women who follow the island's goddess may enter.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only women who follow the island's goddess may enter.

MESSAGE.JP: 錠が外され、紋様が描かれる。
MESSAGE.EN: My handcuffs were removed and the crests drawn.
MESSAGE.Translation: My handcuffs were removed and the crests drawn.

MESSAGE.JP: 気は冷えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The air grew chill.
MESSAGE.Translation: The air grew chill.

MESSAGE.JP: はつめたく、痛いぐらいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The water was so cold it hurt.
MESSAGE.Translation: The water was so cold it hurt.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…おかあさんの、マント…もっていかないでください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Please... don't take my mother's cloak.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Please... don't take my mother's cloak.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笑される気配がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I could sense the derision.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could sense the derision.

MESSAGE.JP: ばかな子』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Stupid girl.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Stupid girl.❜

MESSAGE.JP: んな声が聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: That's what I heard.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's what I heard.

MESSAGE.JP: 稽な姿だ、と私は思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I must look silly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I must look silly.

MESSAGE.JP: れは…希望通りのはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This... is probably what I wished for..
MESSAGE.Translation: This... is probably what I wished for..

MESSAGE.JP: ―さいごの想い出を、あの日常ではなく。
MESSAGE.EN: ...To make sure my last memory wasn't of ordinary life.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...To make sure my last memory wasn't of ordinary life.

MESSAGE.JP: ここ』で過ごすことを私が望んだ結果。
MESSAGE.EN: This is the result of me wishing to spend time ❛here.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: This is the result of me wishing to spend time ❛here.❜

MESSAGE.JP: ったのは、真っ黒な牢獄。
MESSAGE.EN: All that was left was the pitch black prison.
MESSAGE.Translation: All that was left was the pitch black prison.

MESSAGE.JP: たくて、暗い…孤独な…何もない宇宙みたいなそこ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was cold, dark... lonely. Like the emptiness of space.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was cold, dark... lonely. Like the emptiness of space.

MESSAGE.JP: 起こってしまった』ことは、変えられない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't change what ❛had already happened.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't change what ❛had already happened.❜

MESSAGE.JP: がはめられる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was trapped in chains.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was trapped in chains.

MESSAGE.JP: ゃらじゃらと耳に響く。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear them rattling.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear them rattling.

MESSAGE.JP: れは私がここから逃げ出さないようにするいましめだった。
MESSAGE.EN: They were a precaution to make sure I couldn't run away.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were a precaution to make sure I couldn't run away.

MESSAGE.JP: い私はきっと、逃げてしまうだろうから。
MESSAGE.EN: Because a weakling like me would definitely run.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because a weakling like me would definitely run.

MESSAGE.JP: の最後の瞬間まで、私は自分自身を縛っていたいと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I was determined to keep myself restrained until the very end.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was determined to keep myself restrained until the very end.

MESSAGE.JP: 弱くて役に立たない私は『鎖』に繋がれて朽ちてしまえばいい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Someone as weak and useless as me should just stay chained up and rot.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Someone as weak and useless as me should just stay chained up and rot.

MESSAGE.JP: も知らぬまま、大気圏で燃え尽きたあの犬のように。
MESSAGE.EN: Like that dog that burned up in the atmosphere that no one knew about.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like that dog that burned up in the atmosphere that no one knew about.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「オトタチバナみたいです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm just like Ototachibana...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm just like Ototachibana...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「それとも、アンドロメダでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Or maybe Andromeda.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Or maybe Andromeda.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I whispered.
MESSAGE.Translation: I whispered.

MESSAGE.JP: にも届かないその言葉を。
MESSAGE.EN: But there was nobody to hear me.
MESSAGE.Translation: But there was nobody to hear me.

MESSAGE.JP: に先がないのなら…暖かな場所にはいられなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no future... and as such I could not stay in a kind place.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no future... and as such I could not stay in a kind place.

MESSAGE.JP: もかも見捨てて、わがままを通してしまった私には。
MESSAGE.EN: I forsook everything for my selfishness.
MESSAGE.Translation: I forsook everything for my selfishness.

MESSAGE.JP: こがお似合いだ、私には。
MESSAGE.EN: This place suits me.
MESSAGE.Translation: This place suits me.

MESSAGE.JP: の『クドリャフカ』のように。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like that ❛Kudryavka.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like that ❛Kudryavka.❜

MESSAGE.JP: ことも繋がらない、何もない、真っ暗な、宇宙みたいな、この場所は。
MESSAGE.EN: This place is like space: pitch-black, empty, and connected to nothing.
MESSAGE.Translation: This place is like space: pitch-black, empty, and connected to nothing.

MESSAGE.JP: る場所も。
MESSAGE.EN: With no place to go home to.
MESSAGE.Translation: With no place to go home to.

MESSAGE.JP: 場所も…私にはないから。
MESSAGE.EN: I have nowhere I belong.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have nowhere I belong.

MESSAGE.JP: まがい物のライカ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛The fake Laika.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛The fake Laika.❜

MESSAGE.JP: ―繰り返し聞いた、適切な、言葉――。
MESSAGE.EN: ...that rather appropriate name that I kept hearing...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...that rather appropriate name that I kept hearing...

MESSAGE.JP: クド@（…だからあの『クドリャフカ』のように…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@(...That's why I'm like that ❛Kudryavka❜...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@(...That's why I'm like that ❛Kudryavka❜...)

MESSAGE.JP: も知らなかったあの『クドリャフカ』と違って…私は結果を知っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Unlike that ❛Kudryavka❜ who was ignorant, I know how it ends.
MESSAGE.Translation: Unlike that ❛Kudryavka❜ who was ignorant, I know how it ends.

MESSAGE.JP: この先』を知っている。
MESSAGE.EN: I know what's ❛ahead.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I know what's ❛ahead.❜

MESSAGE.JP: からあの『クドリャフカ』のように…。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why I'm like ❛Kudryavka❜...
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why I'm like ❛Kudryavka❜...

MESSAGE.JP: めて、物言わぬ歯車ぐらいにはなりたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: At least, I wanted to be a quiet little gear.
MESSAGE.Translation: At least, I wanted to be a quiet little gear.

MESSAGE.JP: いを捨てて、黙って消えたら…みんな、少しは私を許してくれるでしょうか…？
MESSAGE.EN: If I abandon my feelings, shut up, and disappear... would everyone forgive me...?
MESSAGE.Translation: If I abandon my feelings, shut up, and disappear... would everyone forgive me...?

MESSAGE.JP: らない子だった、と…言わないでいてくれるのではないでしょうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: They wouldn't say I was unnecessary, would they...?
MESSAGE.Translation: They wouldn't say I was unnecessary, would they...?

MESSAGE.JP: の耳障りな音がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard the sound of the chains rustling...
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard the sound of the chains rustling...

MESSAGE.JP: そして。
MESSAGE.EN: And...
MESSAGE.Translation: And...

MESSAGE.JP: が閉ざされる。
MESSAGE.EN: The door was locked.
MESSAGE.Translation: The door was locked.

MESSAGE.JP: う、私は。
MESSAGE.EN: Now I'm...
MESSAGE.Translation: Now I'm...

MESSAGE.JP: ううん。ずっと前から独りだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...No. I've been alone for a long time.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...No. I've been alone for a long time.

MESSAGE.JP: に戻っただけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm just going back to that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm just going back to that.

MESSAGE.JP: から、悲しくなんかなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It's not sad.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's not sad.

MESSAGE.JP: くも…苦しくもなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It's not hard... or painful.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's not hard... or painful.

MESSAGE.JP: って、ほら。
MESSAGE.EN: See, look.
MESSAGE.Translation: See, look.

MESSAGE.JP: ―涙も、出ない。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm not crying.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm not crying.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I murmured.
MESSAGE.Translation: I murmured.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『はい！　なんですか、リキ？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛Yes! What is it, Riki?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛Yes! What is it, Riki?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 前を呼んでも仕方がないのはわかっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I knew that even if I called her name, nothing would change.
MESSAGE.Translation: I knew that even if I called her name, nothing would change.

MESSAGE.JP: の愛しい匂いも温もりも、近くにあるはずがない。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no way that I could find her sweet scent or warmth here.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no way that I could find her sweet scent or warmth here.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はベッドに腰掛けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I sat down on my bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sat down on my bed.

MESSAGE.JP: 更ながらに後悔していた。
MESSAGE.EN: It might be too late now, but I was full of remorse.
MESSAGE.Translation: It might be too late now, but I was full of remorse.

MESSAGE.JP: めるべきだったんじゃないのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Should I have persuaded her not to go for the sake of her safety?
MESSAGE.Translation: Should I have persuaded her not to go for the sake of her safety?

MESSAGE.JP: や、そうじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: No, that's not it.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, that's not it.

MESSAGE.JP: のために――僕のために、行かないでくれ、と言うべきだったんじゃないだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: For my sake―― should I have told her not to go for my own sake?
MESSAGE.Translation: For my sake―― should I have told her not to go for my own sake?

MESSAGE.JP: んなことを、今更に僕は後悔していた。
MESSAGE.EN: I regretted that I hadn't,
MESSAGE.Translation: I regretted that I hadn't,

MESSAGE.JP: そうに言ったくせに。
MESSAGE.EN: despite the fact that I had so grandly told her to go.
MESSAGE.Translation: despite the fact that I had so grandly told her to go.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「行くなと言えば…良かったのに…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I should've just told her... not to go...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I should've just told her... not to go...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は頭を抱え込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I buried my head in my hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: I buried my head in my hands.

MESSAGE.JP: の心は後悔でいっぱいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was full of regret.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was full of regret.

MESSAGE.JP: わつく教室にいることなんて出来なかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't stand being in the noisy classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't stand being in the noisy classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 下をふらふらと歩く。
MESSAGE.EN: I unsteadily walked into the hallway.
MESSAGE.Translation: I unsteadily walked into the hallway.

MESSAGE.JP: 界がおぼつかない。
MESSAGE.EN: My vision was shaky.
MESSAGE.Translation: My vision was shaky.

MESSAGE.JP: ん、と誰かとぶつかる。
MESSAGE.EN: I bumped into somebody.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bumped into somebody.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ご、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S-sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S-sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: って歩き出そうとすると呼び止められた。
MESSAGE.EN: Before I could resume walking, the person spoke up to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before I could resume walking, the person spoke up to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「直枝理樹？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Riki Naoe?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Riki Naoe?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 木さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Futaki-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Futaki-san.

MESSAGE.JP: は無理矢理中庭に引っ張られ、栄養ドリンクを押しつけられた。
MESSAGE.EN: She dragged me out to the courtyard and thrust an energy drink at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She dragged me out to the courtyard and thrust an energy drink at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「飲みなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Drink it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Drink it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え…なんで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... how come...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... how come...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「いいから。飲みなさい！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Just do it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Just do it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「う、うん…ん…ん…げほげほっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝O-okay... Hmm... hm... hm... *cough*cough*!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝O-okay... Hmm... hm... hm... *cough*cough*!❞

MESSAGE.JP: てて飲んだのでむせる。
MESSAGE.EN: Because of the hurry at which I'd obeyed, I choked on the drink.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because of the hurry at which I'd obeyed, I choked on the drink.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「それからさっさと寝なさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝And go to bed already!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝And go to bed already!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…寝られるわけないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I can't sleep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I can't sleep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「クドリャフカのこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Because of Kudryavka?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Because of Kudryavka?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…二木さんには関係ない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...That's none of your business.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...That's none of your business.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 木さんは肩をすくめた。
MESSAGE.EN: She shrugged.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shrugged.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「確かにね。関係ないわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Definitely, that's none of my business.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Definitely, that's none of my business.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だったら、放っておいてよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then just leave me alone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then just leave me alone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「しゃきっとしなさい！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You have to man up!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You have to man up!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手なことを言うひとだ…
MESSAGE.EN: Gosh, she just says whatever she wants, doesn't she...
MESSAGE.Translation: Gosh, she just says whatever she wants, doesn't she...

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「おまじない、唱えてあげたんでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝You cast that spell on her, didn't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝You cast that spell on her, didn't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おまじない…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That spell...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That spell...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…確かに、クドに言われるまま、唱えたけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I did just as she told me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I did just as she told me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「幸運を祈る、とかそんな意味合いだ、って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She said that it was some sort of good luck charm...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She said that it was some sort of good luck charm...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 木さんは一瞬目を丸くした。
MESSAGE.EN: Futaki-san widened her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Futaki-san widened her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: れから、あのお馬鹿娘が、と吐き捨てた。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Such a stupid girl,❜ she then spit out in dismay.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Such a stupid girl,❜ she then spit out in dismay.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何を言ってるのか、わからないよ、二木さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you talking about, Futaki-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you talking about, Futaki-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「…『毛もなく（ニ・プーカ）、羽もなく（ニ・ペーラ）』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...❛Neither fur, nor feather.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...❛Neither fur, nor feather.❜❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「羽根をむしられて身一つで地獄へ行け、と。そうでなければ幸運は得られない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝If you wish for happiness, you have to have your feathers plucked off and go to hell with nothing on you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝If you wish for happiness, you have to have your feathers plucked off and go to hell with nothing on you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「…ロシア風の考えよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...That's a Russian concept of gaining happiness.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...That's a Russian concept of gaining happiness.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな…！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「だから、あなたがそんな風ではクドリャフカに不運が訪れてしまうじゃないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝So if you keep behaving that way, Kudryavka won't be able to get any luck.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝So if you keep behaving that way, Kudryavka won't be able to get any luck.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「片道切符のクドリャフカ…帰ることができなかった可哀想な子」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Kudryavka with a one-way ticket... she couldn't make it back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Kudryavka with a one-way ticket... she couldn't make it back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「そんな結末が望みなの、あなたは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Are you wishing for that kind of ending?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Are you wishing for that kind of ending?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「しっかりしなさい！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Get a grip on yourself!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Get a grip on yourself!❞

MESSAGE.JP: りをたたえた目で睨み付ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Her angry eyes glared at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her angry eyes glared at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 木さんはそのまま行ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: And then she walked away.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then she walked away.

MESSAGE.JP: 元のドリンク剤をあおる。
MESSAGE.EN: I took another sip of the energy drink.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took another sip of the energy drink.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「げほげほっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝*Cough*cough*...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝*Cough*cough*...❞

MESSAGE.JP: かに…僕が落ち込んでいたらいけないのは確かだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as she had said... I had no time to be depressed like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as she had said... I had no time to be depressed like this.

MESSAGE.JP: ん、と誰かとぶつかる。
MESSAGE.EN: I bumped into somebody.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bumped into somebody.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ご、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S-sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S-sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: って歩き出そうとすると呼び止められた。
MESSAGE.EN: Before I could resume walking, the person spoke up to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before I could resume walking, the person spoke up to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「理樹くん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 留佳さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「どうしたの、理樹くん。顔色悪いよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What's wrong, Riki-kun? You look pale.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What's wrong, Riki-kun? You look pale.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「ちゃんと寝てる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Are you not sleeping well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Are you not sleeping well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…大丈夫だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'm fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'm fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「そんな顔して、大丈夫って言われても説得力がないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Those words aren't very convincing when you look like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Those words aren't very convincing when you look like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめん、葉留佳さん、今は余裕があんまりないんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, Haruka-san. I'm a little out of it right now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, Haruka-san. I'm a little out of it right now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「知ってるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 留佳さんは静かな口調だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san was speaking quietly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san was speaking quietly.

MESSAGE.JP: 段とは想像もできないぐらい。
MESSAGE.EN: It was completely out of the norm.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was completely out of the norm.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「知ってるよ。みんな心配してる。もちろん、私も」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I know. Everyone's worried. Even me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I know. Everyone's worried. Even me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「ついてきて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Come with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Come with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「葉留佳さん、でも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But Haruka-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But Haruka-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「いいから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's fine, come on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's fine, come on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は黙って葉留佳さんと歩き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I kept quiet and went with Haruka-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I kept quiet and went with Haruka-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「疲れてるときには甘いものを食べるといいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝When you're exhausted, you should eat sweet things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝When you're exhausted, you should eat sweet things.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「と、これは小毬ちゃんの受け売りなんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's something I learned from Komari-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's something I learned from Komari-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 白模様のハンカチ。
MESSAGE.EN: She pulled out a black and white handkerchief.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pulled out a black and white handkerchief.

MESSAGE.JP: の上に置かれたマフィン。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a muffin on top of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a muffin on top of it.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「蜂蜜入りだから栄養価たっぷり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There's honey in it, so it's really good for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There's honey in it, so it's really good for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「食欲がないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm not hungry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm not hungry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「そっか。でも、食べると元気出ると思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh. But I think you'll feel better if you eat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh. But I think you'll feel better if you eat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「クド公と一緒に作ってたくさん焼いたあとにね、冷凍してたの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I made a lot of them with Little Kud and refrigerated them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I made a lot of them with Little Kud and refrigerated them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…クドと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...With Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...With Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「そうだよ。…前、スコーンやマフィンを食べたの覚えてる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yep. Remember those scones and muffins you ate before?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yep. Remember those scones and muffins you ate before?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 憶を辿る。
MESSAGE.EN: I racked my memory.
MESSAGE.Translation: I racked my memory.

MESSAGE.JP: ういえば、クドと校内で遊んだ朝に食べたのは葉留佳さんのスコーンだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Come to think of it, when I played with Kud outside of school that one morning, we ate Haruka-san's scones.
MESSAGE.Translation: Come to think of it, when I played with Kud outside of school that one morning, we ate Haruka-san's scones.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…覚えてる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... I remember.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... I remember.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「そっか。よかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Really? I'm so glad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Really? I'm so glad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「…お節介もたまには、してみるものだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I guess sometimes it's okay not to mind your own business.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I guess sometimes it's okay not to mind your own business.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「あはは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahaha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahaha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気なく笑う葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san gave a dispirited laugh.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san gave a dispirited laugh.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「そのあとにクド公と一緒に作ったりしてたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝After that, I made some with Little Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝After that, I made some with Little Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「…作りたてのほうが解凍ものよりおいしいね。あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...I bet they'd taste much better if they were made fresh, though. Ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...I bet they'd taste much better if they were made fresh, though. Ahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「あいにく、どれがクド公お手製なのかわからないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Unfortunately, I don't know which ones were made by Little Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Unfortunately, I don't know which ones were made by Little Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「多分、形がきれいなやつだね。教えればすぐ上手くなったからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Probably the ones that look nice. She got the hang of it in no time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Probably the ones that look nice. She got the hang of it in no time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「はるちんの立場なかったですヨ、まったくもう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝There really wasn't much for Haruchin to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝There really wasn't much for Haruchin to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 談めかして葉留佳さんが言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She said it like it was a joke.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said it like it was a joke.

MESSAGE.JP: も直ぐ真顔になった。
MESSAGE.EN: But her face quickly became serious.
MESSAGE.Translation: But her face quickly became serious.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「元気だしてよ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Cheer up, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Cheer up, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は黙ってマフィンを口にした。
MESSAGE.EN: I said nothing and took a bite of the muffin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said nothing and took a bite of the muffin.

MESSAGE.JP: 蜜の甘さは、舌の上で苦みみたいに思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: The sweetness of the honey was bitter to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sweetness of the honey was bitter to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…葉留佳さんの言うとおりだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It's just like you said.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It's just like you said.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「うん…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yeah...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yeah...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「止めれば良かった…！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I should've stopped Kud...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I should've stopped Kud...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ん。ベンチに拳を叩きつけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Bam. I punched the bench.
MESSAGE.Translation: Bam. I punched the bench.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「…どっちがいいか、なんてわかんないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Which is better? I have no idea...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Which is better? I have no idea...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どういうこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What do you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What do you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「クド公にとっても。理樹くんにとっても」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝For Little Kud. Or for Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝For Little Kud. Or for Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「どっちがいいか、なんてわからないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Which is better? I just don't know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Which is better? I just don't know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「どっちでも同じかもしれないし……どっちでもいいのかもしれないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Perhaps either way would have been the same... and either way would have been fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Perhaps either way would have been the same... and either way would have been fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「クド公さ。私なんかより、ずっと強いと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I think Little Kud is stronger than me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I think Little Kud is stronger than me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「私は、クド公みたいに、善意を信じられない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I can't believe everything is good like Little Kud does.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I can't believe everything is good like Little Kud does.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「悪意がないなんて嘘だーって言ったら、あの子、笑うんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If you told her it was a lie that evil doesn't exist, she'd just laugh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If you told her it was a lie that evil doesn't exist, she'd just laugh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「笑って言うんだ。どんな結果だったとしても、その最初の動機は悪意なんかじゃないはずだってね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She'd laugh and say that no matter what the result was, the intention wasn't evil.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She'd laugh and say that no matter what the result was, the intention wasn't evil.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「ほんとに、おひとよしだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She really is kind-hearted.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She really is kind-hearted.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「『悪意のない悪意』にさらされてもそんなこと言えるなんて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She can still say it even if you point out to her that's ❛evil without ill will.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She can still say it even if you point out to her that's ❛evil without ill will.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「だから私には、クド公の考えとか理解できないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That's why I can't understand her thinking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That's why I can't understand her thinking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「クド公が何を望んでいるか、を考えてあげてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Think about what Little Kud wants.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Think about what Little Kud wants.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「理樹くんはそれができると思うから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I think you can do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I think you can do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕には…何もできないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I... can't do anything...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I... can't do anything...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 力だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was powerless.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was powerless.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「…そうかも、しれないね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Maybe you're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Maybe you're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 留佳さんは俯いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san hung her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san hung her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「それでも、そうでないかも、しれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Even so, maybe you're wrong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Even so, maybe you're wrong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「だから考えてあげてよ。理樹くん、考えるの得意でしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So give it some thought for her sake. You're good at thinking, aren't you Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So give it some thought for her sake. You're good at thinking, aren't you Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん…、けど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yea... but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yea... but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「お別れの挨拶、さ。クド公、なんて言った？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What did Little Kud say to you when she left?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What did Little Kud say to you when she left?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 突な違う話題を葉留佳さんは口にした。
MESSAGE.EN: She suddenly changed the subject.
MESSAGE.Translation: She suddenly changed the subject.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えっと…よく聞き取れなかったけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Umm... I didn't really hear her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Umm... I didn't really hear her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドの挨拶を思い出して口にしてみる……。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to remember and repeat what she'd said...
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to remember and repeat what she'd said...

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『ばいばいです、リキ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛Bai bai, Riki.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛Bai bai, Riki.❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『Прощайте（ぷらしゃーいちー）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛Прощайте(Proschayte).❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛Прощайте(Proschayte).❜

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「普通のさよなら、しなかったんだ、やっぱり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That definitely wasn't a normal goodbye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That definitely wasn't a normal goodbye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「だーざーふとら、とかよくクド公言ってたけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝She usually says something like ❛da zavtra.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝She usually says something like ❛da zavtra.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「そゆのとは違う時に使う挨拶があるらしいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That one seemed like something you'd say at a different time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That one seemed like something you'd say at a different time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「…もう二度と会えないときの挨拶…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Like when you aren't going to see them again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Like when you aren't going to see them again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「告別の、挨拶」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝For when you're leaving forever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝For when you're leaving forever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: つり、と呟かれたその言葉。
MESSAGE.EN: She sighed as she said it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sighed as she said it.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No way...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No way...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だってクドは、戻ってくるって、だから、僕は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But she said she'd be back. That's why I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But she said she'd be back. That's why I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「ロシアではね、願うことと逆のことを言うって風習もあるみたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It seems there's a tradition in Russia of saying the opposite of what you wish for.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It seems there's a tradition in Russia of saying the opposite of what you wish for.❞

MESSAGE.JP: を上げる葉留佳さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san looked up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san looked up.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「幸せになれ、ってかわりに不幸になれ、って言うんだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Instead of wishing you happiness they wish you bad luck.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Instead of wishing you happiness they wish you bad luck.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「幸せを願うとそれが叶わないから、不幸を口にするんだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝If you wish for happiness it won't come true, so you wish for bad luck instead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝If you wish for happiness it won't come true, so you wish for bad luck instead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「おかしな風習だね。あはは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's a weird tradition. Ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's a weird tradition. Ahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「葉留佳さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haruka-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「でもねぇ、『もう会えません』の反対はなんだろね、理樹くん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝So Riki-kun, what do you think is the opposite of ❛I won't see you again❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝So Riki-kun, what do you think is the opposite of ❛I won't see you again❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「私にはわからないよ。クド公がどんな気持ちでそれを言ったのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't know what feelings Little Kud was trying to convey.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't know what feelings Little Kud was trying to convey.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「理樹くんに別れを告げて、クド公は何のために、行ったんだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Why did she say ❛bye❜ to you and leave...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Why did she say ❛bye❜ to you and leave...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「何もかも失われて、二度と手に入らないとわかったとき…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝When you've lost everything and can't get it back,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝When you've lost everything and can't get it back,❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「私たちは、何を願うべきなんだろうね…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What should you say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What should you say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「さて、私のお節介はもうおしまい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, I'm done meddling.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, I'm done meddling.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「ここからは、理樹くんとクド公の問題だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The rest is between you and Little Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The rest is between you and Little Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「脇役は舞台から去るとしますですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝The supporting actress is exiting stage.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝The supporting actress is exiting stage.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「がんばれ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Good luck, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Good luck, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「でわでわ、…またね、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well... see ya, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well... see ya, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳@「また、今度、次に、会おうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝We'll meet again, next time, in the future.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝We'll meet again, next time, in the future.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「は、葉留佳さ……」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H-Haruka-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H-Haruka-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ンチを立ち上がると葉留佳さんはウィンクする。
MESSAGE.EN: She stood up and winked at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stood up and winked at me.

MESSAGE.JP: のまま中庭を出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like that, she left the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like that, she left the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: び止める間も無かった。
MESSAGE.EN: There wasn't even time to call out to her to stop.
MESSAGE.Translation: There wasn't even time to call out to her to stop.

MESSAGE.JP: ンカチの上には、マフィンがまだ残っている。
MESSAGE.EN: The muffin was still sitting on the handkerchief.
MESSAGE.Translation: The muffin was still sitting on the handkerchief.

MESSAGE.JP: つ、口にする。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a bite.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a bite.

MESSAGE.JP: くて…けれど、少し苦かった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was sweet... but a little bitter.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was sweet... but a little bitter.

MESSAGE.JP: ん、と誰かとぶつかる。
MESSAGE.EN: I bumped into somebody.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bumped into somebody.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ご、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S-sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S-sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: って歩き出そうとすると呼び止められた。
MESSAGE.EN: Before I could resume walking, the person spoke up to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before I could resume walking, the person spoke up to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「直枝さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「どうされましたか？　顔色が悪いですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Did something happen? You look pale.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Did something happen? You look pale.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「ちゃんと寝ていますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Are you sleeping properly?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Are you sleeping properly?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…大丈夫だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'm fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'm fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「説得力がありませんよ、真っ青です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You have no persuasive power. You look ghastly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You have no persuasive power. You look ghastly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめん、西園さん…話してる余裕があんまりないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, Nishizono-san... I don't really feel like talking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, Nishizono-san... I don't really feel like talking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「ええ、わかっています」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Okay, I understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Okay, I understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「ですが、誰かと話すことは無駄ではありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But it would not be pointless to talk to someone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But it would not be pointless to talk to someone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「物語は、介添人を必要とします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝To advance the story you need other characters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝To advance the story you need other characters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「知識ある女性（にょしょう）が困難に悩む騎士の前に現われるものです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝An intelligent proprietress has appeared in front of the troubled knight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝An intelligent proprietress has appeared in front of the troubled knight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんはいつものように静かな口調だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was speaking quietly as usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was speaking quietly as usual.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「もっとも、能美さんに言わせると、わたしの知識は退廃的な耽美に満ちている、らしいのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝According to Noumi-san, my knowledge is full of decadent aesthetics.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝According to Noumi-san, my knowledge is full of decadent aesthetics.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の微笑みは僕に有無を言わせない力があった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her smile made me unsure of whether I was supposed to respond or not.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her smile made me unsure of whether I was supposed to respond or not.

MESSAGE.JP: 庭の日陰にあるベンチに僕を座らせた西園さんは、そっと僕に飴を差し出した。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san made me sit on the bench in the shade and handed me a toffee.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san made me sit on the bench in the shade and handed me a toffee.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「こんぶ飴…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's konbu flavored...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's konbu flavored...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「抹茶とあわせた歯にくっつかない逸品ですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's a rare gem that goes well with green tea and doesn't stick to your teeth.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's a rare gem that goes well with green tea and doesn't stick to your teeth.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「読書をしているわたしに山盛りで残していったんですよ、能美さんが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Noumi-san left a pile of it with me who's always reading.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Noumi-san left a pile of it with me who's always reading.❞

MESSAGE.JP: にいれた。
MESSAGE.EN: I put it in my mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put it in my mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: かな塩味が広がる。
MESSAGE.EN: It had a weird salty flavor.
MESSAGE.Translation: It had a weird salty flavor.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドは…西園さんに、別れに際してなんて言ったのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san... what did Kud say to you when she left?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san... what did Kud say to you when she left?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「特には」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Nothing special.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Nothing special.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんは首を振った。
MESSAGE.EN: She shook her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shook her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「能美さんは、わたしには、さようなら、と言っただけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝She just said ❛good-bye❜ to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝She just said ❛good-bye❜ to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そっか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そういえば、西園さんとクドが部屋でどう過ごしているか、僕には想像しづらいな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Come to think of it, I have a hard time imagining what you two do together in your room...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Come to think of it, I have a hard time imagining what you two do together in your room...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「普通ですよ？　至って普通です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It was normal. Completely normal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It was normal. Completely normal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「ふたりで本を読んでいることが多かったですから、静かなものです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝We would often both be reading, so it was quiet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝We would often both be reading, so it was quiet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「西園さんの本を？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She read your books?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She read your books?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「わたしの本が多かったですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝She did, quite often.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝She did, quite often.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…ちなみに薄い方の本は見せていませんよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Incidentally, I didn't let her read those with risky content.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Incidentally, I didn't let her read those with risky content.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…聞き流すよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay... I'll just pretend I didn't hear you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay... I'll just pretend I didn't hear you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「互いの本を読みました。能美さんの本は実利にだいぶ傾いていましたが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝We would read each other's books. Hers tended to be very practical.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝We would read each other's books. Hers tended to be very practical.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「例えば？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Like what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Like what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「カーボンナノチューブ理論とか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Like Carbon Nanotube Theory.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Like Carbon Nanotube Theory.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「難しそうな本だね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That sounds difficult.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That sounds difficult.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「能美さんのお母さんは軍の技官なのだそうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It seems Noumi-san's mother is a military technician.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It seems Noumi-san's mother is a military technician.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「物性物理の博士号保持者で」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝She has a doctorate in condensed matter physics.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝She has a doctorate in condensed matter physics.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「軍から打ち上げ会社に出向している、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝She left the military to work for a company.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝She left the military to work for a company.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「自分より優れたと思われる存在が身近にいるという悩みは、当人が一番感じることでしょうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Noumi-san, more than anyone else, must have felt the agony of having someone you consider superior to yourself so close by.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Noumi-san, more than anyone else, must have felt the agony of having someone you consider superior to yourself so close by.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんは呟くように言う。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san spoke in a whisper.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san spoke in a whisper.

MESSAGE.JP: れは実感が伴った感想のようにも思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Those were probably the kind of thoughts that accompanied her true feelings.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those were probably the kind of thoughts that accompanied her true feelings.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「あとは、宇宙開発の歴史ものとかですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝She also read about the history of space development.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝She also read about the history of space development.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「そうそう…能美さんのなまえのもとになった犬」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's right... Noumi-san's name came from a dog.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's right... Noumi-san's name came from a dog.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドから由来は聞いたことがあるような気がするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I feel like she's told me about that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I feel like she's told me about that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「人間より先に宇宙に行ったんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It went into space before humans.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It went into space before humans.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…その犬がどうなったか、ご存じですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Are you aware of what happened to that dog?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Are you aware of what happened to that dog?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は戸惑った。
MESSAGE.EN: That confused me.
MESSAGE.Translation: That confused me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうなったか、って…打ち上げは成功したんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What happened? The launch was a success, wasn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What happened? The launch was a success, wasn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「宇宙でなにか実験のデータを取ったんだよねきっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Out in space they got some data for an experiment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Out in space they got some data for an experiment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…それから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は、はたと気がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I suddenly realized it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I suddenly realized it.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…そうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...That's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...That's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんの視線が僕を貫く。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san's gaze was glued to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san's gaze was glued to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「『戻ってこなかった』のです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝❛Never to return.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝❛Never to return.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「……なっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「片道切符だったのです。彼女は、戻ってこなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It was a one-way ticket. She didn't come back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It was a one-way ticket. She didn't come back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「いえ、戻れなかったのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Rather, she couldn't come back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Rather, she couldn't come back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「そのロケットに帰還装置はついていませんでした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That rocket wasn't equipped to come back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That rocket wasn't equipped to come back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「だから…彼女は、戻れなかったのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's why... She couldn't come back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's why... She couldn't come back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…二度と。再び」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Never again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Never again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな、…ひどい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's... horrible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's... horrible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…ひどくはありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...No it's not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...No it's not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうして！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「だって『彼女』はあとに続くもののための礎となったのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Because ❛she❜ became a foundation for those to come.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Because ❛she❜ became a foundation for those to come.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「未来のための歯車となって消えたのですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝She became a gear for the future and disappeared.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝She became a gear for the future and disappeared.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「誰かの役に立つことは『彼女』の望みでもあったでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It was ❛her❜ desire to be useful to someone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It was ❛her❜ desire to be useful to someone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ひどい話じゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's horrible, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's horrible, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝......❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなの、ひどい話じゃないか！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Seriously, is that not horrible!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Seriously, is that not horrible!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: はベンチから立ち上がり、西園さんを見下ろした。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood up and looked down at Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood up and looked down at Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんはあくまで冷静に僕に返す。
MESSAGE.EN: She remained calm and responded.
MESSAGE.Translation: She remained calm and responded.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…ひどくはありません。周りもそれを望んだのですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...It's not. Because that's what the people around ❛her❜ wanted too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...It's not. Because that's what the people around ❛her❜ wanted too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「そこに悪意はありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝There is no evil in that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝There is no evil in that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「もっと大きな目的のために…『彼女』はそれを望んだのですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝❛She❜ wanted that for the sake of a larger goal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝❛She❜ wanted that for the sake of a larger goal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「悪意がなくたって…ひどいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even if it wasn't evil... it's horrible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even if it wasn't evil... it's horrible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「能美さんは、彼女に自分を重ねていたのでしょうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Noumi-san identifies with her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Noumi-san identifies with her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「彼女？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「クドリャフカ、とは女の子の名前です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝❛Kudryavka❜ is a girl's name.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝❛Kudryavka❜ is a girl's name.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「ストレルカ、ヴェルカがそうであるように」
