MESSAGE.JP: クド@「さいしょに名乗ったときに…はじめて笑わずきいてくれたひと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You were the first person in my life... who didn't laugh when I told them my name.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You were the first person in my life... who didn't laugh when I told them my name.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ええ、しっています…みなさんは、悪意はないのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Of course I know... that nobody means offense.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Of course I know... that nobody means offense.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「他人（ひと）のすることは…そのねっこに、悪意はないのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No one ever does anything... with bad intentions.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No one ever does anything... with bad intentions.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わかっていても…笑われることは辛かった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But even knowing that... it felt bad being laughed at.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But even knowing that... it felt bad being laughed at.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「でもリキ…あなたは笑わなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But Riki... you alone didn't laugh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But Riki... you alone didn't laugh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「それだけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That was all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That was all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ほかのひとたちとちがって…わたしには、それだけでした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That alone was enough... to make you different from other people.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That alone was enough... to make you different from other people.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「たったそれだけ。でも、わたし、それだけでうれしかったんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It was just that, but that alone made me happy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It was just that, but that alone made me happy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は何も言えなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't say anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't say anything.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…わたしはばかだったので…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I was stupid...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I was stupid...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「だいじなときに、まちがえてしまいました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝So I made a mistake at the critical moment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝So I made a mistake at the critical moment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「『それ』は、あとから手に入れた、墜ちたロケットの欠片」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝❛That thing❜ is a piece of the crashed rocket I got afterward.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝❛That thing❜ is a piece of the crashed rocket I got afterward.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私の『きもち』のざんがいです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It is the wreckage of my ❛feelings❜...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It is the wreckage of my ❛feelings❜...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキが捨ててくれれば…もう、こころのこり、ないはずです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝If Riki threw it away... my regrets should finally disappear completely.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝If Riki threw it away... my regrets should finally disappear completely.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ない、はず…です…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝They should have... disappeared...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝They should have... disappeared...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃくりあげるクド。
MESSAGE.EN: She was sobbing.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was sobbing.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…なのに…私、私、どうして、こうかい、してる…んでしょう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...But... why, why do I... still have regrets?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...But... why, why do I... still have regrets?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「本当はそばに…いたかったのに…となりに、いたかったのにっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Deep down... I wanted to... I wanted to be next to you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Deep down... I wanted to... I wanted to be next to you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私…みっともないです…じぶんかってで、どうしようもないこで…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm... so pathetic... I'm such a selfish, hopeless girl...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm... so pathetic... I'm such a selfish, hopeless girl...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「こんなことかんがえてるの、知られたら、きらわれちゃいます…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝If he knew that, he'd hate me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝If he knew that, he'd hate me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「でもいいですよね…こんなところに、リキがいるわけ、…ないですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But it's fine, isn't it... there's no way... Riki's here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But it's fine, isn't it... there's no way... Riki's here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ひとりごとです…ひとりごと、だから……っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm just talking to myself... to myself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm just talking to myself... to myself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「うぅ…うっ……うくっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Uu... uu... uu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Uu... uu... uu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドの頬を涙がただ伝う。
MESSAGE.EN: Tears were running down her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Tears were running down her face.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ごほっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝*Cough*.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝*Cough*.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドの咳はひどい音だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was coughing violently.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was coughing violently.

MESSAGE.JP: に繋がれている体は、痛む喉や胸をこらえることもできない。
MESSAGE.EN: Because of the chains, she couldn't even bring her hands to her sore throat or chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because of the chains, she couldn't even bring her hands to her sore throat or chest.

MESSAGE.JP: 骨やあばらが冷えた鋭い岩に擦りつけられる。
MESSAGE.EN: And she kept scratching her body on the cold rocks.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she kept scratching her body on the cold rocks.

MESSAGE.JP: ド。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: が望まぬ歯車になろうと、在ろうとした女の子。
MESSAGE.EN: The girl who was trying to be a gear that nobody wished for.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl who was trying to be a gear that nobody wished for.

MESSAGE.JP: ドの体はちっぽけで、脆弱で。
MESSAGE.EN: Her body so tiny and fragile,
MESSAGE.Translation: Her body so tiny and fragile,

MESSAGE.JP: にも折れそうな水晶の針のようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: it looked like nothing more than a thin crystal needle about to break at any moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: it looked like nothing more than a thin crystal needle about to break at any moment.

MESSAGE.JP: かさが増え始めている。
MESSAGE.EN: The water level was getting higher.
MESSAGE.Translation: The water level was getting higher.

MESSAGE.JP: だろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Rain?
MESSAGE.Translation: Rain?

MESSAGE.JP: れとも川の水か。
MESSAGE.EN: Or river water?
MESSAGE.Translation: Or river water?

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「さよならです、リキ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's time to say good-bye, Riki...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's time to say good-bye, Riki...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドの声が遠のく。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice was gradually growing distant.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice was gradually growing distant.

MESSAGE.JP: きらめの気配が感じられた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the voice of one who had given up everything.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the voice of one who had given up everything.

MESSAGE.JP: は、叫んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I shouted, yelled out at her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shouted, yelled out at her.

MESSAGE.JP: は叫ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: I kept yelling out loud.
MESSAGE.Translation: I kept yelling out loud.

MESSAGE.JP: らは何ひとつ持っていなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Neither of us had anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: Neither of us had anything.

MESSAGE.JP: の理不尽な世界に、状況に対応する術を何も持っていなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Neither of us had any means to fight against this brutal situation, this world.
MESSAGE.Translation: Neither of us had any means to fight against this brutal situation, this world.

MESSAGE.JP: も間違っていると思った。
MESSAGE.EN: But I still believed that it was wrong
MESSAGE.Translation: But I still believed that it was wrong

MESSAGE.JP: 自分の気持ち』を手放して、自分を殺すこと。
MESSAGE.EN: to let go of her true feelings and kill herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: to let go of her true feelings and kill herself.

MESSAGE.JP: れが世界に役立つことだ、なんて納得したくなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't want to understand how it would be something helpful for the world.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't want to understand how it would be something helpful for the world.

MESSAGE.JP: んなことを目的にしたくなんかなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't want to let it be the purpose of her life.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't want to let it be the purpose of her life.

MESSAGE.JP: から、あきらめない。
MESSAGE.EN: So I wasn't going to give up.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I wasn't going to give up.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…でも…」
クド@「…りたいです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Want to...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Want to...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…かえり、たい、です…っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I want... to come back...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I want... to come back...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: は『手』を闇の先へ伸ばした。
MESSAGE.EN: I reached my ❛hand❜ into the darkness ahead.
MESSAGE.Translation: I reached my ❛hand❜ into the darkness ahead.

MESSAGE.JP: ゃらじゃらと耳障りな鎖の音。
MESSAGE.EN: The chains made a disgusting noise.
MESSAGE.Translation: The chains made a disgusting noise.

MESSAGE.JP: たい。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt like
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt like

MESSAGE.JP: 識の先は冷たい壁の感触で閉ざされている。
MESSAGE.EN: there was a cold, impenetrable wall sitting between my consciousness and hers.
MESSAGE.Translation: there was a cold, impenetrable wall sitting between my consciousness and hers.

MESSAGE.JP: くはずがなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I should've realized that there was no way I could reach her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should've realized that there was no way I could reach her.

MESSAGE.JP: 離を隔ててなお届くものなんてあるのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Was there anything out there that could reach from one to another across any distance?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was there anything out there that could reach from one to another across any distance?

MESSAGE.JP: …いや。
とつだけ、ある。
MESSAGE.EN: There was just one thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was just one thing.

MESSAGE.JP: 信じればきっと…繋がったまま…なのです…たぶん』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛If you believe, then definitely... we'll be connected... maybe.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛If you believe, then definitely... we'll be connected... maybe.❜

MESSAGE.JP: メージした。
MESSAGE.EN: I pictured it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pictured it.

MESSAGE.JP: の腕の歯車と、クドの樹を。
MESSAGE.EN: The gear painted on my arm, and the tree on Kud's.
MESSAGE.Translation: The gear painted on my arm, and the tree on Kud's.

MESSAGE.JP: し、と音が聞こえた気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard the wall giving way.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard the wall giving way.

MESSAGE.JP: え何もかもが通用しないときでも、僕は信じる。
MESSAGE.EN: Even when nothing could work, I still believed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even when nothing could work, I still believed.

MESSAGE.JP: じたい。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to believe.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to believe.

MESSAGE.JP: 屈じゃなく、心の底から信じたい。
MESSAGE.EN: Without a shadow of doubt, I wanted to believe right from the bottom of my heart,
MESSAGE.Translation: Without a shadow of doubt, I wanted to believe right from the bottom of my heart,

MESSAGE.JP: とクドは繋がっているのだと。
MESSAGE.EN: that she and I were connected.
MESSAGE.Translation: that she and I were connected.

MESSAGE.JP: だ、それだけのことだけれど…だからこそ。
MESSAGE.EN: That might have sounded stupid to anyone else... but that was why
MESSAGE.Translation: That might have sounded stupid to anyone else... but that was why

MESSAGE.JP: かを好きだっていう気持ちを捨てることなんか、できやしない――！
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't give up my feelings of love for her――!
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't give up my feelings of love for her――!

MESSAGE.JP: から『これ』はクドの手に還るべきだった。
MESSAGE.EN: And that was why ❛this❜ had to be returned to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that was why ❛this❜ had to be returned to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 悔も。
MESSAGE.EN: Regret.
MESSAGE.Translation: Regret.

MESSAGE.JP: 意も。
MESSAGE.EN: Affection.
MESSAGE.Translation: Affection.

MESSAGE.JP: 分が抱いた気持ちは捨てられない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't cast away any of those feelings.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't cast away any of those feelings.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…っ！　……リキーっ!!」
クド@「…リ…キっ!!」
たい壁の先、クドの手を僕は掴んだ…気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: And then I felt like I caught hold of her hand through the cold wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then I felt like I caught hold of her hand through the cold wall.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…あ…あぁ…これ…は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Ah... ahh... this... is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Ah... ahh... this... is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: い岩牢の中で鈍く光るそれをクドはまじまじと見つめた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was staring hard at that object shining dully in the rocky prison.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was staring hard at that object shining dully in the rocky prison.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「どうして…リキ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Why... Riki...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Why... Riki...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: くて、苦しくて、熱くて寒い。
MESSAGE.EN: Pain, suffering, heat, cold.
MESSAGE.Translation: Pain, suffering, heat, cold.

MESSAGE.JP: ドと感覚が重なったかのようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt like I was sharing all of her sensations.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt like I was sharing all of her sensations.

MESSAGE.JP: っそりとした手にのるそれを僕（クド）は見つめる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud (I) was staring dumbly down on that thing on her tiny hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud (I) was staring dumbly down on that thing on her tiny hand.

MESSAGE.JP: ることはひとつだった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was only one thing she had to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was only one thing she had to do.

MESSAGE.JP: くりと頷くクド。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded, knowing that.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded, knowing that.

MESSAGE.JP: のひらの金属の塊を握って――
MESSAGE.EN: She tightened her fingers around that chunk of metal――
MESSAGE.Translation: She tightened her fingers around that chunk of metal――

MESSAGE.JP: ―思い切り、叩きつける…っ！
MESSAGE.EN: ――and with all her strength, hurled it...!
MESSAGE.Translation: ――and with all her strength, hurled it...!

MESSAGE.JP: ラスをたたき割った音を何十倍にもした音が鼓膜を叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: A sound indescribably louder than the shattering of glass split my ears.
MESSAGE.Translation: A sound indescribably louder than the shattering of glass split my ears.

MESSAGE.JP: 茶け錆が浮いた鎖は、砕け散った。
MESSAGE.EN: The chains turned to rust and exploded into fragments.
MESSAGE.Translation: The chains turned to rust and exploded into fragments.

MESSAGE.JP: らばらと砕けた鎖がからだを叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: Some of the pieces fell down onto her body.
MESSAGE.Translation: Some of the pieces fell down onto her body.

MESSAGE.JP: 吊られていた身が冷たい水の中に沈んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: In the next moment, her body gained freedom and sank into the cold water.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the next moment, her body gained freedom and sank into the cold water.

MESSAGE.JP: えた水を飲み、もがく。
MESSAGE.EN: She was struggling to lift herself up as the water surged into her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was struggling to lift herself up as the water surged into her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はぁ…っ…はぁ…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hah... hah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hah... hah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 首が痛い。
MESSAGE.EN: Her wrists were in pain.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her wrists were in pain.

MESSAGE.JP: や背中から流れる血が気持ち悪い。
MESSAGE.EN: It was disgusting to see the blood streaming down her (my) sides and back.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was disgusting to see the blood streaming down her (my) sides and back.

MESSAGE.JP: により足が重たくて動かせそうにない。
MESSAGE.EN: To make matters worse, her legs felt like iron, barely able to move.
MESSAGE.Translation: To make matters worse, her legs felt like iron, barely able to move.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも…それでも、クドは一歩動いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite that... she took one step forward.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite that... she took one step forward.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はっ……
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hah......
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hah......

MESSAGE.JP: ぁっ…
MESSAGE.EN: hah...
MESSAGE.Translation: hah...

MESSAGE.JP: ぁ…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: hah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: hah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: たい水をかきわけ、あえぎ、よろめきながら、歩く――
MESSAGE.EN: She was wading through the cold water, gasping and wobbling――
MESSAGE.Translation: She was wading through the cold water, gasping and wobbling――

MESSAGE.JP: 呼吸するクドの吐息が聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard her deep breathing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard her deep breathing.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はぁ…はぁ…っ…はぁ…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Haah... hah... haah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Haah... hah... haah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: い闇。
MESSAGE.EN: Beyond the darkness,
MESSAGE.Translation: Beyond the darkness,

MESSAGE.JP: の先に針のような光が見える。
MESSAGE.EN: there was a light as small as the point of a needle.
MESSAGE.Translation: there was a light as small as the point of a needle.

MESSAGE.JP: しゃり。
MESSAGE.EN: However,
MESSAGE.Translation: However,

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ぁ…ぅ…つっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Uh... ugh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Uh... ugh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: しゃ、ずるる。
MESSAGE.EN: it seemed so far away.
MESSAGE.Translation: it seemed so far away.

MESSAGE.JP: 砂に体が滑る音。
MESSAGE.EN: And she kept slipping on the earth and sand underfoot.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she kept slipping on the earth and sand underfoot.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「うう…はぁ、…はぁ…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Uu... hah... hah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Uu... hah... hah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: んばれ、クド――がんばれっ！
MESSAGE.EN: Hang in there, Kud―― hang in there!
MESSAGE.Translation: Hang in there, Kud―― hang in there!

MESSAGE.JP: ドは懸命にはい上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: Up she climbed, desperately,
MESSAGE.Translation: Up she climbed, desperately,

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「う…ぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝U... ugh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝U... ugh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の、先へ。
MESSAGE.EN: toward the light.
MESSAGE.Translation: toward the light.

MESSAGE.EN: The light.
MESSAGE.Translation: The light.

MESSAGE.JP: 膜に焼き付く光。
MESSAGE.EN: The searing light blinded her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: The searing light blinded her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: れと共に、強烈な潮風と空気の匂いを感じる。
MESSAGE.EN: And simultaneously, a strong sea breeze assaulted her with the smell of salt.
MESSAGE.Translation: And simultaneously, a strong sea breeze assaulted her with the smell of salt.

MESSAGE.JP: 闇に慣れた目が外の光に対応するまでのわずかな時間。
MESSAGE.EN: During the short time until her eyes adapted to light...
MESSAGE.Translation: During the short time until her eyes adapted to light...

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ごほっ…すぅ…はぁ…ごほっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝*Cough*... *phaa*... *cough*.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝*Cough*... *phaa*... *cough*.❞

MESSAGE.JP: が新鮮な空気を求める。
MESSAGE.EN: she tried to draw in as much of the fresh air as she could.
MESSAGE.Translation: she tried to draw in as much of the fresh air as she could.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はぁ…はぁ…ーっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hah... hah... ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hah... hah... ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: り仰ぐ。
MESSAGE.EN: She then lifted her eyes up to the sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: She then lifted her eyes up to the sky.

MESSAGE.JP: び込んできたのは、自分をぐるりと取り囲む空の色。
MESSAGE.EN: What jumped into her eyes was a vast sky surrounding her in every direction.
MESSAGE.Translation: What jumped into her eyes was a vast sky surrounding her in every direction.

MESSAGE.JP: 頂は綺麗な蒼から紅へたどるカーテンみたいに染まっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: From its zenith, the colors expanded from beautiful dark blue to a ruby red.
MESSAGE.Translation: From its zenith, the colors expanded from beautiful dark blue to a ruby red.

MESSAGE.JP: ぁ――、とクド（僕）はためいきを吐く。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah――, Kud (I) let out a sigh in relief.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah――, Kud (I) let out a sigh in relief.

MESSAGE.JP: のマグカップのような空の色。
MESSAGE.EN: The sky's color was just like that of her treasured mug.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sky's color was just like that of her treasured mug.

MESSAGE.JP: ０ノーティカルマイルの空みたいな。
MESSAGE.EN: It was just like that sky seen 50 nautical miles away.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was just like that sky seen 50 nautical miles away.

MESSAGE.JP: んぐんとどこか遠くへ飛んでいく風景のような――
MESSAGE.EN: The scene that made you feel like you were flying far, far away――
MESSAGE.Translation: The scene that made you feel like you were flying far, far away――

MESSAGE.JP: ―圧倒的なまでの、深い蒼のグラデーション。
MESSAGE.EN: ――the breathtaking gradation of the deep blue.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――the breathtaking gradation of the deep blue.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「きれいな、そら、です…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What a beautiful sky...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What a beautiful sky...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「とても、きれい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's very beautiful...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's very beautiful...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「どこまでも、行けそうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It makes me feel like I can also get anywhere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It makes me feel like I can also get anywhere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「いまなら、いますぐにだって、だいすきなひとのもとへいけそうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Right now, I feel like I could get to the one I love in an instant.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Right now, I feel like I could get to the one I love in an instant.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あおと、むらさきいろが混じってて、すごい、そら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝The amazingly beautiful sky where blue and violet mix...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝The amazingly beautiful sky where blue and violet mix...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「れっつ・りたーん・とぅ・ほーむ（さぁ、かえろう）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Rettsu reta-n tu- ho-mu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Rettsu reta-n tu- ho-mu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドの囁き。
MESSAGE.EN: She whispered quietly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She whispered quietly.

MESSAGE.JP: 上げている空の色は魂が震えそうなぐらい鮮やかだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The sky she saw at that moment was brilliant enough to shake one's very soul.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sky she saw at that moment was brilliant enough to shake one's very soul.

MESSAGE.JP: を開ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 知った自分の部屋。
MESSAGE.EN: I was in our room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was in our room.

MESSAGE.JP: はベッドに仰向きで倒れている自分を認識した。
MESSAGE.EN: Lying flat on my back on my bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Lying flat on my back on my bed.

MESSAGE.JP: ったままの、手を持ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Tentatively, I brought my closed hand in front of my face,
MESSAGE.Translation: Tentatively, I brought my closed hand in front of my face,

MESSAGE.JP: っくり、広げる。
MESSAGE.EN: and then opened it slowly.
MESSAGE.Translation: and then opened it slowly.

MESSAGE.JP: けた機械部品は、そこにはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: The melted machine part wasn't there.
MESSAGE.Translation: The melted machine part wasn't there.

MESSAGE.JP: く握りしめ過ぎた僕の手のひらは、いくつも傷がつき、血が流れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: My hand was full of bleeding gashes from having clenched it too tightly in my fist.
MESSAGE.Translation: My hand was full of bleeding gashes from having clenched it too tightly in my fist.

MESSAGE.JP: う一度、握る。
MESSAGE.EN: I clasped my hand close again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I clasped my hand close again.

MESSAGE.JP: のは夢だったのだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Had that been a dream...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Had that been a dream...?

MESSAGE.JP: れでも、僕はクドが見上げた空の色を、確かに覚えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: But I did remember, so vividly, the sky Kud had been staring up at.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I did remember, so vividly, the sky Kud had been staring up at.

MESSAGE.JP: は電気店のテレビの前でふと足を止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I stopped in front of a TV being displayed in the window of an electronics store.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stopped in front of a TV being displayed in the window of an electronics store.

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…ヴア島近辺の諸島への封鎖解除は国連軍の計画通り進行中であり…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...As the UN forces' plan progresses, the countries neighboring Tevua are one by one lifting their blockades...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...As the UN forces' plan progresses, the countries neighboring Tevua are one by one lifting their blockades...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「フェイズ４への移行をスポークスマンは発表しました」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝The spokesperson has announced that Tevua has now been shifted down to Phase 4.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝The spokesperson has announced that Tevua has now been shifted down to Phase 4.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「環太平洋経済機構は墜落跡地のローンチ・サークル・ドライバー建設を核とした復興プロジェクト支援を表明…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝The Pacific Rim economic system has announced their restructuring project that aims to build a launch ring at the rocket's crash site...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝The Pacific Rim economic system has announced their restructuring project that aims to build a launch ring at the rocket's crash site...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…封鎖解除に伴う復興作業は一部汚染区域を除いて本格化しており…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...Apart from certain parts of the country, a lot of other reconstruction work is also well under way...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...Apart from certain parts of the country, a lot of other reconstruction work is also well under way...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…生存者は医療チェックを受けたあと希望国へ送還が実施され…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...The survivors are being sent to the countries they requested, after receiving medical check-ups...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...The survivors are being sent to the countries they requested, after receiving medical check-ups...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ニュース番組@「…ＴＡＳＡ輸送艦サジタリウスはカオシュンへ入港後シンガポールへ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `News Show@❝...TASA's amphibious vessel, Sagittarius, has arrived in Kaohsiung and is presently heading for Singapore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `News Show@❝...TASA's amphibious vessel, Sagittarius, has arrived in Kaohsiung and is presently heading for Singapore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「理樹、どうした？面白い番組でもやってるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What are you watching, Riki? Is there an interesting show?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What are you watching, Riki? Is there an interesting show?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 元の携帯が震えた。
MESSAGE.EN: The cellphone in my chest pocket vibrated.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cellphone in my chest pocket vibrated.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドからだ…！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's from Kud...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's from Kud...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「クー公から？　やっと戻ってこれるのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝From Little Kuu? So, she's finally coming back...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝From Little Kuu? So, she's finally coming back...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「って、理樹、どこへ行くんだよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, Riki, where are you going!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, Riki, where are you going!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: きなり走り出した僕の後ろから真人が何か言っていたけれど、僕には聞こえなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato said something to me as I took off running, but I didn't catch his words.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato said something to me as I took off running, but I didn't catch his words.

MESSAGE.JP: る。
MESSAGE.EN: I ran.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ran.

MESSAGE.JP: る…走る。
MESSAGE.EN: Ran... and ran.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ran... and ran.

MESSAGE.JP: んの少しの時間。
MESSAGE.EN: It was just a short period of time.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was just a short period of time.

MESSAGE.JP: れすらも、ひどくもどかしい。
MESSAGE.EN: But every moment felt frustratingly, painfully long.
MESSAGE.Translation: But every moment felt frustratingly, painfully long.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「はぁ、はぁ…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haah... haah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haah... haah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は、学校の校門までたどり着いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I arrived at the school gate.
MESSAGE.Translation: I arrived at the school gate.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…はぁ、はぁ…っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Haah, haah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Haah, haah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: こに、彼女は、立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There she stood.
MESSAGE.Translation: There she stood.

MESSAGE.JP: と泥、機械の油で汚れた帽子とマントを身につけた――クドが。
MESSAGE.EN: Her hat and cloak were covered in dust, mud and machine oil.. but it was Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her hat and cloak were covered in dust, mud and machine oil.. but it was Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: ぁ、と木々の梢を風が渡る。
MESSAGE.EN: A wind shook the treetops.
MESSAGE.Translation: A wind shook the treetops.

MESSAGE.JP: ントがぱたぱた、とはためいた。
MESSAGE.EN: And made her cloak flutter.
MESSAGE.Translation: And made her cloak flutter.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の前に立っているのは、僕の大好きな女の子のかたちをしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The girl right before me looked the spitting image of the girl I loved.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl right before me looked the spitting image of the girl I loved.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…だよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You are Kud, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You are Kud, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: も、僕は訊いてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: But I had to ask,
MESSAGE.Translation: But I had to ask,

MESSAGE.JP: の光景が信じられなかったから。
MESSAGE.EN: because I couldn't believe my eyes,
MESSAGE.Translation: because I couldn't believe my eyes,

MESSAGE.JP: の元に帰ってくることを願っていたのに。
MESSAGE.EN: even though I had been wishing so hard that she would come back to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: even though I had been wishing so hard that she would come back to me.

MESSAGE.JP: っていたからこそ、とても信じられなくて。
MESSAGE.EN: No, it was because I had wished so hard for it that I couldn't believe it.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, it was because I had wished so hard for it that I couldn't believe it.

MESSAGE.JP: なんじゃないか、と僕は手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: I stretched out my arm toward her as if to ascertain if this was real.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stretched out my arm toward her as if to ascertain if this was real.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の手は――僕の手に呼応するかのように伸ばされたクドの手と結びついた。
MESSAGE.EN: In response to that―― she reached out hers, and our hands joined together.
MESSAGE.Translation: In response to that―― she reached out hers, and our hands joined together.

MESSAGE.JP: かくて、ちっぽけなクドの手のひら。
MESSAGE.EN: I could feel the warm, tiny palm of her hand in mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could feel the warm, tiny palm of her hand in mine.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ただいまです、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm back, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm back, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドの返事は任務完了（Mission Complete）、とでも言うかのように僕の耳には響いた。
MESSAGE.EN: To my ears, those words of hers sounded like ❛Mission Complete.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: To my ears, those words of hers sounded like ❛Mission Complete.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の』クドリャフカは還ってきたのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛My❜ Kudryavka had come home.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛My❜ Kudryavka had come home.

MESSAGE.JP: 界をぐるりと一巡りして。
MESSAGE.EN: Kudryavka was back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kudryavka was back.

MESSAGE.JP: 底誇らしげに、僕が好きになったあの笑顔を携えて。
MESSAGE.EN: She came back proudly with that smile that made me love her so.
MESSAGE.Translation: She came back proudly with that smile that made me love her so.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「メール、届きましたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Did you get my mail?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Did you get my mail?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded in confirmation.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded in confirmation.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうですか、リキが出迎えてくれて少しびっくりです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I see. I was a little surprised to find you here to welcome me back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I see. I was a little surprised to find you here to welcome me back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「言うなれば、くどりゃふか・すとらいく・ばっくす！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's, so to speak, Kudoryavuka sutoraiku bakkusu!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's, so to speak, Kudoryavuka sutoraiku bakkusu!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I guess?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I guess?❞

MESSAGE.JP: んなときでも、クドは間の抜けたことを言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Even at this touching reunion, she didn't hesitate to make a joke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even at this touching reunion, she didn't hesitate to make a joke.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド…っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: はクドの手を引っ張ると、抱き寄せた。
MESSAGE.EN: I pulled her in and hugged her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pulled her in and hugged her.

MESSAGE.JP: っかりと腕でクドの小さな体を抱え込む。
MESSAGE.EN: I wrapped my arms tightly around her small body.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wrapped my arms tightly around her small body.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ただいまです、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm back, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm back, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: きすくめられたまま、クドはそっと僕の背中に手を回した。
MESSAGE.EN: In my embrace, she tenderly slid her arms around my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: In my embrace, she tenderly slid her arms around my back.

MESSAGE.JP: の温もりを制服越しに感じる。
MESSAGE.EN: I could feel her warmth through my school uniform.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could feel her warmth through my school uniform.

MESSAGE.JP: ーい、と真人たちの声が聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard the other teammates hailing us.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard the other teammates hailing us.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「行きましょう、リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Let's go, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Let's go, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: はクドの体を放した。
MESSAGE.EN: We separated from each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: We separated from each other.

MESSAGE.JP: ドがにっこり笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave me a grin.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave me a grin.

MESSAGE.JP: の端からこぼれた涙を、振り払って。
MESSAGE.EN: Having brushed away the tears from the corners of my eyes,
MESSAGE.Translation: Having brushed away the tears from the corners of my eyes,

MESSAGE.JP: はクドの手を引き、歩き出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I began to walk with Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: I began to walk with Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: び始まった、僕たちの日常に。
MESSAGE.EN: They started again,
MESSAGE.Translation: They started again,

MESSAGE.JP: さくて…
MESSAGE.EN: these regular lives...
MESSAGE.Translation: these regular lives...

MESSAGE.JP: っぽけで…
MESSAGE.EN: our teeny...
MESSAGE.Translation: our teeny...

MESSAGE.JP: さやかすぎる、歯車の日々に。
MESSAGE.EN: tiny everyday lives as gears in this big clockwork.
MESSAGE.Translation: tiny everyday lives as gears in this big clockwork.

MESSAGE.JP: ―深い感謝と、愛情をこめて。
MESSAGE.EN: ――And with gratitude and love, we welcomed them.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――And with gratitude and love, we welcomed them.

MESSAGE.JP: 界にただいまを宣言して、僕と僕の好きなひとは、歩みを再開したのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Declaring our return home to the world, my beloved girl and I took our first steps onward again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Declaring our return home to the world, my beloved girl and I took our first steps onward again.

MESSAGE.JP: 界が白くもやいでいく。
MESSAGE.EN: My vision was a white haze.
MESSAGE.Translation: My vision was a white haze.

MESSAGE.JP: の手に感じる温もり。
MESSAGE.EN: The warmth of this hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: The warmth of this hand.

MESSAGE.JP: れが嬉しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It made me so happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: It made me so happy.

MESSAGE.JP: の間の…叶うことのないゆえの…夢のようなものだとしても。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if it was but a fleeting dream of things unattainable...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if it was but a fleeting dream of things unattainable...

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『片想いだったですから』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛It was a one-sided love.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛It was a one-sided love.❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『…最初から、片想いでしたから』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛...It was one-sided from the start.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛...It was one-sided from the start.❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『片想いなのは、変わりませんから』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛That won't change.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛That won't change.❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『最初から…私の気持ちは、変わらないままでした』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛My feelings... haven't changed.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛My feelings... haven't changed.❜

MESSAGE.JP: いだ手の温もりは、手放したくなんかなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't want to let go of the warmth of the hand that I held.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't want to let go of the warmth of the hand that I held.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも。
MESSAGE.EN: But even so,
MESSAGE.Translation: But even so,

MESSAGE.JP: っと、指を、自分から、ほどいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I gently... pulled away my fingers from his.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gently... pulled away my fingers from his.

MESSAGE.JP: 識が沈んでいく。
MESSAGE.EN: I started to lose consciousness.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started to lose consciousness.

MESSAGE.JP: いかける誰かの声がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear someone asking a question.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear someone asking a question.

MESSAGE.JP: ―いいの？
MESSAGE.EN: ...Are you okay with this?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Are you okay with this?

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『だー（はい）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛Da. (Yes.)❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛Da. (Yes.)❜

MESSAGE.JP: ―続けてもいいのに？
MESSAGE.EN: ...Do you not want to keep going?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Do you not want to keep going?

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『にぇっと（いいえ）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛Net. (No.)❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛Net. (No.)❜

MESSAGE.JP: ―何もなかったことになってしまうのに？
MESSAGE.EN: ...Even though it means undoing everything that happened?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Even though it means undoing everything that happened?

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『…だー（はい）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛...da. (Yes.)❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛...da. (Yes.)❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『リキが望んでくれましたから…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛It's what Riki wanted...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛It's what Riki wanted...❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『…それを聞けて嬉しかったですから』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛...so I was glad I could hear it.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛...so I was glad I could hear it.❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『そこにいるだけで…歯車になる、と教えてもらいましたから』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛He told me that I can be a gear... by just being here.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛He told me that I can be a gear... by just being here.❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『あいあむ・のーほえあ（わたしは　どこにも　いない）…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛Aiamu no-hoea... (I am nowhere.)❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛Aiamu no-hoea... (I am nowhere.)❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『ふー・あむ・あい？（だから　わたしは　だれ　なんでしょうか？）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛Fu- amu ai? (So who am I?)❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛Fu- amu ai? (So who am I?)❜

MESSAGE.JP: の、疑問。
MESSAGE.EN: It was my question.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was my question.

MESSAGE.JP: っとずっと考えていた疑問。
MESSAGE.EN: The question I had been thinking about.
MESSAGE.Translation: The question I had been thinking about.

MESSAGE.JP: の答えを見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: I had found the answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had found the answer.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『あいあむ・なう・ひあ（ここに　いるのが　わたし）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛Aiamu nau hia. (I am here now.)❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛Aiamu nau hia. (I am here now.)❜

MESSAGE.JP: ても簡単な答えだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a very simple answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a very simple answer.

MESSAGE.JP: から、やっぱり、捨てることなんか出来なかった。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why I couldn't toss them aside.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why I couldn't toss them aside.

MESSAGE.JP: てちゃいけなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I mustn't.
MESSAGE.Translation: I mustn't.

MESSAGE.JP: らなかった、という後悔も。
MESSAGE.EN: My regret of not going home.
MESSAGE.Translation: My regret of not going home.

MESSAGE.JP: キに好きだと言いたかった気持ちも。
MESSAGE.EN: And the feeling that I wanted to tell Riki I love him.
MESSAGE.Translation: And the feeling that I wanted to tell Riki I love him.

MESSAGE.JP: 認できたから。
MESSAGE.EN: I had affirmed them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had affirmed them.

MESSAGE.JP: 後悔の塊』の重みを『思い出す』。
MESSAGE.EN: I ❛remembered❜ the weight of a ❛lump of regrets.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I ❛remembered❜ the weight of a ❛lump of regrets.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 上着のポケットに入ったまま』のドッグタグと機械部品。
MESSAGE.EN: The dog tags and the machine part ❛in the coat pocket.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: The dog tags and the machine part ❛in the coat pocket.❜

MESSAGE.JP: れは自分でずっと持っていなくちゃいけない。
MESSAGE.EN: I must always keep them with me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I must always keep them with me.

MESSAGE.JP: されてから、見ることも、捨てることも出来ず…ただポケットの中にずっとあったもの。
MESSAGE.EN: I hadn't been able to look at or throw them away since they were given to me... they were always just in my pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hadn't been able to look at or throw them away since they were given to me... they were always just in my pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: かったことには出来ないから…私は握りしめていなければいけなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't pretend nothing happened... so I had to hold on to them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't pretend nothing happened... so I had to hold on to them.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『後悔しています』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛I regret it.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛I regret it.❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『これからもずっと後悔し続けるでしょう』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛I'll probably keep regretting it.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛I'll probably keep regretting it.❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『でも好きだと伝えたその先に日常があったように』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛But just like there were peaceful days after I confessed my love...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛But just like there were peaceful days after I confessed my love...❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『後悔を抱き続けたその先にも…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛After days full of regret...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛After days full of regret...❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『…その先にも日常があったのでしょう』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛...Perhaps, there would be normal days afterward.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛...Perhaps, there would be normal days afterward.❜

MESSAGE.JP: で縛られたように、そこに留まるだけには意味がなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was pointless to just stop there, as if trapped in chains.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was pointless to just stop there, as if trapped in chains.

MESSAGE.JP: こで終わるだけでは意味がなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was pointless to just end there.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was pointless to just end there.

MESSAGE.JP: から…もう、私の願いの欠片は…返さなくちゃいけないと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why... I had to return the pieces of my wish.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why... I had to return the pieces of my wish.

MESSAGE.JP: いが叶ったという奇跡。
MESSAGE.EN: My feelings being reciprocated was a miracle.
MESSAGE.Translation: My feelings being reciprocated was a miracle.

MESSAGE.JP: いだ手の温もりという奇跡。
MESSAGE.EN: The warmth of that hand I held was a miracle.
MESSAGE.Translation: The warmth of that hand I held was a miracle.

MESSAGE.JP: も、たった一つのそれを失っても…手放してもなお、その代わり願うことがある。
MESSAGE.EN: But even if it meant losing what had been everything to me, to let it go... I had another wish.
MESSAGE.Translation: But even if it meant losing what had been everything to me, to let it go... I had another wish.

MESSAGE.JP: の前の『げんじつ』を見つめてなお、願うことがある。
MESSAGE.EN: Even after facing reality, I still had a wish.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even after facing reality, I still had a wish.

MESSAGE.JP: の願いの欠片は自分のためじゃなくて…ほかの誰かのために。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't a wish for myself... it was for someone else.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't a wish for myself... it was for someone else.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『だって、すきでした』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛Because, I loved you.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛Because, I loved you.❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『だいすきでした』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛I loved you a lot.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛I loved you a lot.❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『ほんとに、ほんとにだいすきでした』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛I really, really loved you.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛I really, really loved you.❜

MESSAGE.JP: ― This little world is geared to our wish ――
MESSAGE.EN: ―― This little world is geared to our wish ――
MESSAGE.Translation: ―― This little world is geared to our wish ――

MESSAGE.JP: だから、私の願い、ひとかけら、歯車に戻して。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That's why... my wish... was to return a fragment... into a gear.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That's why... my wish... was to return a fragment... into a gear.

MESSAGE.JP: いすきなひとのために、想いを歯車にして。
MESSAGE.EN: To make my feelings a gear for the person that I love.
MESSAGE.Translation: To make my feelings a gear for the person that I love.

MESSAGE.JP: 庭に、変化を。
MESSAGE.EN: To bring change to this little world.
MESSAGE.Translation: To bring change to this little world.

MESSAGE.JP: の先へ。私には手の届かないその先へ。
MESSAGE.EN: To make things move forward. Beyond my reach.
MESSAGE.Translation: To make things move forward. Beyond my reach.

MESSAGE.JP: こかで、時計の針が動く音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear the sound of a clock ticking somewhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear the sound of a clock ticking somewhere.

MESSAGE.JP: い針が、ひとつ進む音。
MESSAGE.EN: The sound of that long hand ticking forward a minute.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sound of that long hand ticking forward a minute.

MESSAGE.JP: しぎしと歯車が動く音。
MESSAGE.EN: The sound of a gear moving.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sound of a gear moving.

MESSAGE.JP: なさん、ごめんなさい。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone, I'm sorry.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone, I'm sorry.

MESSAGE.JP: がままで、ごめんなさい。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sorry for my selfishness.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sorry for my selfishness.

MESSAGE.JP: ていくこと、ゆるしてください。
MESSAGE.EN: Please forgive me for leaving.
MESSAGE.Translation: Please forgive me for leaving.

MESSAGE.JP: うか、どうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Please, somehow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Please, somehow.

MESSAGE.JP: キの強さに、私の笑顔が…最期のときまで、役立てますように。
MESSAGE.EN: Let my smile help Riki be strong until the end.
MESSAGE.Translation: Let my smile help Riki be strong until the end.

MESSAGE.JP: キと鈴さんが…たどり着けますように。
MESSAGE.EN: Let Riki and Rin-san finally get there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Let Riki and Rin-san finally get there.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『でも…リキと鈴さんなら、だいじょうぶですよね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛But it's those two, so they'll be fine.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛But it's those two, so they'll be fine.❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『きっと…だいじょうぶ…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛They'll definitely... be fine...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛They'll definitely... be fine...❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『私は…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛Was I...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛Was I...❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『…あなたにとって…良き歯車だったでしょうか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛A good gear... for you?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛A good gear... for you?❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@『この場所の歯車になれたでしょうか…？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❛Was I able to be a gear for this place?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❛Was I able to be a gear for this place?❜

MESSAGE.JP: も答えてくれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Nobody answered.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nobody answered.

MESSAGE.JP: う光は針の先みたいになっている。
MESSAGE.EN: The light was already like a needlepoint.
MESSAGE.Translation: The light was already like a needlepoint.

MESSAGE.JP: は願った。
MESSAGE.EN: I wished.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wished.

MESSAGE.JP: から、願った。
MESSAGE.EN: I wished from the bottom of my heart.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wished from the bottom of my heart.

MESSAGE.JP: う私は泣いていない。
MESSAGE.EN: I won't cry anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: I won't cry anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: ぶん…。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe...

MESSAGE.JP: っと。
MESSAGE.EN: Definitely.
MESSAGE.Translation: Definitely.

MESSAGE.JP: らしゃーいちー…／もうにどとあえないさようならを／…また、あいたい、です…
MESSAGE.EN: Proshaite... A farewell for when you won't meet again ...but I hope we can...
MESSAGE.Translation: Proshaite... A farewell for when you won't meet again ...but I hope we can...

MESSAGE.JP: 全てが、真っ暗に閉ざされた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Everything was sealed in darkness.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Everything was sealed in darkness.

MESSAGE.JP: 下がりの家庭科部室。
MESSAGE.EN: Early afternoon, home-ec room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Early afternoon, home-ec room.

MESSAGE.JP: 院したクドに呼び出されて部室に来た。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud had called me here after getting out of the hospital.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud had called me here after getting out of the hospital.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: びかけると、クドはくるりと振り返って微笑んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: When I called out, she spun around and smiled.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I called out, she spun around and smiled.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…ただいま、です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I'm back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I'm back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…おかえり、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... welcome home, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... welcome home, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは黒が混じった青色をした紙袋を胸に抱いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was holding a blue and black paper bag to her chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was holding a blue and black paper bag to her chest.

MESSAGE.JP: 匠化されたＴＡＳＡのマークがついた紙袋。
MESSAGE.EN: The bag had ❛TASA❜ stylized on it.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bag had ❛TASA❜ stylized on it.

MESSAGE.JP: さごそ、と紙袋を開ける音。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a rustling sound as she opened the bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a rustling sound as she opened the bag.

MESSAGE.JP: ん、と紙袋が落ちた。
MESSAGE.EN: She dropped the bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: She dropped the bag.

MESSAGE.JP: り出したプラスティックケースを両手で差し出すクド。
MESSAGE.EN: With both hands she held out the plastic case she'd taken out.
MESSAGE.Translation: With both hands she held out the plastic case she'd taken out.

MESSAGE.JP: ＶＤのマークが入っている。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a DVD case.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a DVD case.

MESSAGE.JP: ラスティックケースは汚れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The case was dirty.
MESSAGE.Translation: The case was dirty.

MESSAGE.JP: ースの端っこは、よじれて歪んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Its edges were twisted and warped.
MESSAGE.Translation: Its edges were twisted and warped.

MESSAGE.JP: で、あぶられたかのように。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like it'd been damaged in a fire.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like it'd been damaged in a fire.

MESSAGE.JP: はディスクケースから視線をあげ、クドの瞳を見た。
MESSAGE.EN: I stopped looking at the case and looked Kud in the eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stopped looking at the case and looked Kud in the eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: い込まれるような青の瞳。
MESSAGE.EN: They were blue eyes that you could get lost in.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were blue eyes that you could get lost in.

MESSAGE.JP: 空を映したような、瞳の中に、僕がいる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was lost in her eyes that seemed to be reflecting the sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was lost in her eyes that seemed to be reflecting the sky.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキ…お願いがあるんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki... I have a request.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki... I have a request.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「これを…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Watch this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Watch this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「いっしょに、見てくれませんか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は、静かに頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I silently nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: I silently nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: ゃぶ台の上にはノートパソコンが載っている。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a laptop on the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a laptop on the table.

MESSAGE.JP: かにＤＶＤを読み込む音がする。
MESSAGE.EN: There was the faint noise of it reading the DVD.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was the faint noise of it reading the DVD.

MESSAGE.JP: ニタに、画像が映った。
MESSAGE.EN: The picture came up on the monitor.
MESSAGE.Translation: The picture came up on the monitor.

MESSAGE.JP: 墨色の髪の毛を持つ小柄な女性。
MESSAGE.EN: It showed a small woman with ink-colored hair.
MESSAGE.Translation: It showed a small woman with ink-colored hair.

MESSAGE.JP: 色のつなぎみたいな服。
MESSAGE.EN: She was wearing blue coveralls.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was wearing blue coveralls.

MESSAGE.JP: ライトジャケットのようにも見える。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like a flight suit.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like a flight suit.

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『Доброе утро（おはよう）、クーニャ！』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛Доброе утро (Good morning), Kunya!❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛Доброе утро (Good morning), Kunya!❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…おかあ…さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Mother...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Mother...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『クーニャ、こちらは良い天気だわ。日本はどう？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛We're having nice weather here, Kunya. How's Japan?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛We're having nice weather here, Kunya. How's Japan?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『今はね、最後のブリーフィングが終わって…ひとやすみ、と言ったところかな？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛Right now, we're done with the last briefing... and are resting, I guess you could say.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛Right now, we're done with the last briefing... and are resting, I guess you could say.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『天候が回復したから、ミッションが再開されたわ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛The weather cleared up, so the mission is back under way.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛The weather cleared up, so the mission is back under way.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『クーニャも来たら打上げみれたんだけどね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛I wanted you to come and see the launch.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛I wanted you to come and see the launch.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『…でもクーニャだって考えがあるんだろうから、おかあさんは気にしてないよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛...but I know you have your own reasons, so I don't need to worry.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛...but I know you have your own reasons, so I don't need to worry.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『クーニャのこと、怒ったりがっかりしてないよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛I'm not angry with you, neither am I disappointed in you.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛I'm not angry with you, neither am I disappointed in you.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 性の笑み。クドそっくりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She smiled. It looked just like Kud's.
MESSAGE.Translation: She smiled. It looked just like Kud's.

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『帰ってきたら、きっと色々なお話をしてあげられると思う』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛When I come home, we can talk about all sorts of things.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛When I come home, we can talk about all sorts of things.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『楽しみにしてて。おみやげ何がいい？　とはいっても』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛Look forward to it. I wonder what I should get as a souvenir?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛Look forward to it. I wonder what I should get as a souvenir?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『さすがに昔頼まれた火星の石は無理なんだけどね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛That rock from Mars that you asked for would be impossible.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛That rock from Mars that you asked for would be impossible.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『覚えてる？　クーニャ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛Do you remember that, Kunya?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛Do you remember that, Kunya?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 腕を広げ、右手を左へ、ぶん、と振った。
MESSAGE.EN: She spread her arms wide then swung her left hand into her right one.
MESSAGE.Translation: She spread her arms wide then swung her left hand into her right one.

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『すい、きん、ちか、もく！』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛Sui, kin, chika, moku!❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛Sui, kin, chika, moku!❜

MESSAGE.JP: 性は変な歌を歌い出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She started singing some weird song.
MESSAGE.Translation: She started singing some weird song.

MESSAGE.JP: ドが時々歌うのはやっぱりこのひとの影響なのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: This person is definitely the reason Kud sings sometimes.
MESSAGE.Translation: This person is definitely the reason Kud sings sometimes.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「子守歌でした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's a lullaby.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's a lullaby.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…子守歌？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...A lullaby?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...A lullaby?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「私が別れ際に泣いたとき、歌ってくれたティティウスの歌」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It's the Titius song that she'd sing me whenever we were parting and I cried. ❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's the Titius song that she'd sing me whenever we were parting and I cried. ❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『火星の石は無理だけど、隕石のひとつぐらいはあげられるかも』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛A rock from Mars is impossible, but I can probably give you a meteorite.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛A rock from Mars is impossible, but I can probably give you a meteorite.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『隕石はすごいよー。日本刀も作ることができるんだからね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛Meteorites are incredible. You can even make Japanese swords out of them.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛Meteorites are incredible. You can even make Japanese swords out of them.❜

MESSAGE.JP: んだかこどもみたいなひとだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed like a child.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed like a child.

MESSAGE.JP: 炭のような瞳を輝かせながら隕石について語っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Her charcoal black eyes shone as she talked about meteorites.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her charcoal black eyes shone as she talked about meteorites.

MESSAGE.JP: れを見つめるクドの視線。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was fixated on it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was fixated on it.

MESSAGE.JP: 守っているようなそれが、どちらが親かわからないな、と思った。
MESSAGE.EN: It was like she was watching over her. I couldn't tell who was supposed to be the parent.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was like she was watching over her. I couldn't tell who was supposed to be the parent.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…おもしろいひとだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...She's interesting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...She's interesting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「いつもそうだったんです、おかあさん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Mother was always like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Mother was always like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「星のことになると、話が止まらなくて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝If she started talking about the stars, she'd never stop.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝If she started talking about the stars, she'd never stop.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そらを見上げては、ラ・プティ・プリンスが落ちてこないかなぁって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She'd look up at the sky and wonder if the Little Prince would come falling down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She'd look up at the sky and wonder if the Little Prince would come falling down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んなひとでした、とクドは言った。
MESSAGE.EN: That's the kind of person she was, according to Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's the kind of person she was, according to Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…国が一度は亡くなったおかあさんたちにとって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝For people like my mother who'd lost their country once,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝For people like my mother who'd lost their country once,❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「テヴアは新しい星の国…楽園をそこに築いたって…そのはずだったのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Tevua was a new country of the stars... where they would build a paradise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Tevua was a new country of the stars... where they would build a paradise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その『楽園』から届いた映像の中で、そのひとはただ笑って夢を語っている。
MESSAGE.EN: ...In the film we'd received from that ❛paradise,❜ that person kept smiling and talking about her dreams.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...In the film we'd received from that ❛paradise,❜ that person kept smiling and talking about her dreams.

MESSAGE.JP: ドが夢を語っていたように。
MESSAGE.EN: It was just like when Kud talked about hers.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was just like when Kud talked about hers.

MESSAGE.JP: しそうに語っている。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed to be enjoying herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed to be enjoying herself.

MESSAGE.JP: っすぐに夢を語るひとは、眩しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: This person talking so straight-forwardly about her dream was dazzling.
MESSAGE.Translation: This person talking so straight-forwardly about her dream was dazzling.

MESSAGE.JP: から、クドは、このひとを強く意識したのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why Kud was so caught up in her.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why Kud was so caught up in her.

MESSAGE.JP: がつくと、モニタのそのひとは、黙ってじっと、こちらを――カメラを見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: I noticed that the person on the monitor had stopped talking and was staring this way... into the camera.
MESSAGE.Translation: I noticed that the person on the monitor had stopped talking and was staring this way... into the camera.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…………うぅっ」
ドは俯いて小さく首を何度も振った。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud looked down and gave her head a small shake.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud looked down and gave her head a small shake.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: めくクドの手を僕はそっと握った。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud groaned and I gently grasped her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud groaned and I gently grasped her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…見るって決めたんです。だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I decided I would watch it. That's why.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I decided I would watch it. That's why.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「だから、見なくちゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That's why I have to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That's why I have to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは顔を上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: She raised her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She raised her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『…あのね、少し真面目な話をする』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛...hey, I have something serious to talk about now.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛...hey, I have something serious to talk about now.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を引っ込める女性。
MESSAGE.EN: The woman drew back.
MESSAGE.Translation: The woman drew back.

MESSAGE.JP: メラの向こうにいるクドを見つめているつもりなのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She was probably looking at Kud on the other side of the camera.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was probably looking at Kud on the other side of the camera.

MESSAGE.JP: ぁ、クドといっしょだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, she's just like Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, she's just like Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: い込まれそうなぐらい、澄んだ瞳。
MESSAGE.EN: Her eyes were so clear you could get lost in them.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her eyes were so clear you could get lost in them.

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『この計画には反対するひとも多かったわ。今に至ってもそうよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛There are a lot of people opposed to this project. More now than ever.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛There are a lot of people opposed to this project. More now than ever.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『計画に全てを賭けるのは馬鹿なことなのかもしれない…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛It's probably stupid to bet everything on the project...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛It's probably stupid to bet everything on the project...❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『それでも宇宙に行くことで色々な問題の解決法を見つけられると思うの』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛But we're going to space so that we can find solutions to any number of problems.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛But we're going to space so that we can find solutions to any number of problems.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『先月、島がひとつ沈んだわ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛Last month one of the islands sank.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛Last month one of the islands sank.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『クーニャも行ったことがあるわね。ヴィチローク・べー・オーストラフ（ヴィチロークβ島）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛You'd been there. It was Veterok B Ostrov (Veterok Island B.)❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛You'd been there. It was Veterok B Ostrov (Veterok Island B.)❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『温暖化による海面上昇。対策工事が間に合わなかった』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛The sea level rose due to global warming. The counter-measures weren't finished in time.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛The sea level rose due to global warming. The counter-measures weren't finished in time.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『この打上げに資金が投入されたせいだった』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛It's because all the funds were put into this launch.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛It's because all the funds were put into this launch.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『国土の対水没化事業を最優先にすべきと言う声もあったのに』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛There were people saying that the country's anti-submergence operations should have taken first priority.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛There were people saying that the country's anti-submergence operations should have taken first priority.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『…あの島のひとたちには申し訳ないと思ってる』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛...I'm so sorry for those people.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛...I'm so sorry for those people.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『ただ、政府は、私たちは、それに見合うリターンがあると判断した』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛But the government compared us and them and decided we had more of a return.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛But the government compared us and them and decided we had more of a return.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『…うん、これは、クーニャには関係や責任のない話ね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛...Yes, this is something that you have nothing to do with and hold no responsibility for.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛...Yes, this is something that you have nothing to do with and hold no responsibility for.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『知らないままのほうがいいかもしれないわ、こういう話は』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛It might have been better if you didn't know.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛It might have been better if you didn't know.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『けれど、クーニャ。反対したひとたちにも理由があるの』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛'But Kunya, the opposition has their reasons.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛'But Kunya, the opposition has their reasons.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『もしもあなたが私について何か言われたら…許してあげて』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛Even if people say something about me to you... please forgive them.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛Even if people say something about me to you... please forgive them.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『反対したひとにも…私たちにも…譲れないものがあったの』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛They have things they can't give up no matter what... And we have ours.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛They have things they can't give up no matter what... And we have ours.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『傲慢な言い方ね、これは…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛That must sound arrogant, huh...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛That must sound arrogant, huh...❜

MESSAGE.JP: かっていても、何かを選ばなければならないときがある、と。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if you realize that, there are times you have to make a choice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if you realize that, there are times you have to make a choice.

MESSAGE.JP: 女は呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She whispered.
MESSAGE.Translation: She whispered.

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『あのね、私が志願した理由なんだけど』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛You know, there's a reason why I volunteered.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛You know, there's a reason why I volunteered.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『誰かの役に立つようなことがしたかった。私の長年の夢だったの』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛I wanted to be helpful to someone. That was my long time dream.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛I wanted to be helpful to someone. That was my long time dream.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『ツィオルコフスキーの梯子（はしご）、作りたくて物性物理進んだようなものだし…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛In a sense, I pursued studies in condensed matter physics because I wanted to build the Tsiolkovsky Ladder...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛In a sense, I pursued studies in condensed matter physics because I wanted to build the Tsiolkovsky Ladder...❜

MESSAGE.JP: 慣れぬ言葉にクドを見ると、小声で教えてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at Kud and she quietly explained the words I didn't know.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at Kud and she quietly explained the words I didn't know.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「カーボンナノチューブの研究。それがお母さんのお仕事のひとつ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Carbon nanotube research. That was one of my mother's jobs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Carbon nanotube research. That was one of my mother's jobs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…軌道エレベータの材料となる新素材を作ること…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...They were making new materials to be used for an orbital elevator...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...They were making new materials to be used for an orbital elevator...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「それが、おかあさんの夢でした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That was my mother's dream.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That was my mother's dream.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「島が全部沈んでも、軌道エレベータの途中に住めばいいって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Even if all the islands sank, people could live in the orbital elevator.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Even if all the islands sank, people could live in the orbital elevator.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「うみのただなかにあるのも、そらのただなかにあるのも同じだからって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Being in the middle of the ocean and being in the middle of the sky would be the same.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Being in the middle of the ocean and being in the middle of the sky would be the same.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうしたらほんとうに『ほしのくに』になるんだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That way it could be a real ❛country of the stars.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That way it could be a real ❛country of the stars.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「夢みたいな話を、大まじめに語るひとでした…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She would talk dead-seriously about things that seemed like dreams...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She would talk dead-seriously about things that seemed like dreams...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドの呟き。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud muttered these words.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud muttered these words.

MESSAGE.JP: Ｆ小説みたいなことをまじめに語り、それに向かって努力する親の姿。
MESSAGE.EN: Her mother was someone who could seriously talk about things out of a sci-fi novel and work toward making them reality.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her mother was someone who could seriously talk about things out of a sci-fi novel and work toward making them reality.

MESSAGE.JP: ドがずっとみつめてきたもの。
MESSAGE.EN: That's who Kud was always looking to.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's who Kud was always looking to.

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『世の中の色々な問題は普段実感できない。見えないの』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛There are many problems in the world that you can't personally experience. That you can't see.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛There are many problems in the world that you can't personally experience. That you can't see.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『けれど、見えないからって存在しないわけじゃない』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛But just because you can't see them, that doesn't mean they don't exist.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛But just because you can't see them, that doesn't mean they don't exist.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『“本当に大事なものは、目に見えない”のよ。童話のキツネが言うようにね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛❝What is essential is invisible to the eye.❞ Just like that fox in the fairy tale said.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛❝What is essential is invisible to the eye.❞ Just like that fox in the fairy tale said.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『だから、クーニャ。それを見つけなさい』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛But Kunya. Find it.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛But Kunya. Find it.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『あなたにとって大事なものを。本当に大事なものを』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛Find what's essential to you. What's truly essential.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛Find what's essential to you. What's truly essential.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『そのためなら、自分すら失っても構わないと思うものを』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛Find something more important than yourself.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛Find something more important than yourself.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『大切なもののために、あなたはあなたの考える“歯車”になればいい』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛For the sake of what's precious to you, you should become the kind of ❝gear❞ that you want to be.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛For the sake of what's precious to you, you should become the kind of ❝gear❞ that you want to be.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『それが、私があなたに望む全て』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛That's all I want for you.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛That's all I want for you.❜

MESSAGE.JP: かな間。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a strange pause.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a strange pause.

MESSAGE.JP: めらいがちに続けられる言葉。
MESSAGE.EN: Her words continued, but with uncertainty.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her words continued, but with uncertainty.

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『…ごめんね。もっと早くあなたに伝えておくべきだったかもしれない』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛...I'm sorry. I probably should have told you sooner.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛...I'm sorry. I probably should have told you sooner.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『だから、クーニャ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛So Kunya.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛So Kunya.❜

MESSAGE.JP: ニタの女性は微笑んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The woman on the monitor smiled.
MESSAGE.Translation: The woman on the monitor smiled.

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『あなたさえよければ…隣は空けておくわ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛If it's okay with you... I'll save you a seat.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛If it's okay with you... I'll save you a seat.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『あなた自身がそうしたい、と思うのならば…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛If that's what you want...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛If that's what you want...❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『いつか、いっしょに、みにいこうね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛Someday, we'll go see it, together.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛Someday, we'll go see it, together.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『あなたの“おかえりなさい”を待ってるわ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛I can't wait to hear you say ❝welcome home.❞❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛I can't wait to hear you say ❝welcome home.❞❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『さぁ、この間教えたおまじないをしよう！　用意はいい？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛Okay, let's say the good luck charm I taught you! Ready?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛Okay, let's say the good luck charm I taught you! Ready?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女は人差し指をぴん、と立てた。
MESSAGE.EN: She put her index finger up.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put her index finger up.

MESSAGE.JP: っこり笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: And grinned.
MESSAGE.Translation: And grinned.

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「Раз, два, три！（１、２の、３！）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝Раз, два, три！(1, 2, 3!)❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝Раз, два, три！(1, 2, 3!)❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@「К чёрту（じごくへ　おちろ）！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❝К чёрту (Go to hell!)❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❝К чёрту (Go to hell!)❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「に・ぷーか、に・ぺーら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ni puha, ni pera...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ni puha, ni pera...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドの囁き声は彼女に聞こえるはずもない。
MESSAGE.EN: She obviously couldn't hear Kud's whisper.
MESSAGE.Translation: She obviously couldn't hear Kud's whisper.

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『よし、元気元気！　ちゃんと笑っているかな、Моя дочь（わたしのまなむすめ）？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛Alright, up and at 'em! Are you smiling, Моя дочь (My beloved daughter)?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛Alright, up and at 'em! Are you smiling, Моя дочь (My beloved daughter)?❜

MESSAGE.JP: れでも女性は満足そうに頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave a satisfied nod.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave a satisfied nod.

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『辛いときは…そうね、笑ってみなさい』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛When times are tough... smile.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛When times are tough... smile.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『自分自身の、誰かの励みに…強さに変わるから』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛It will encourage you or somebody else... it can lend you strength.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛It will encourage you or somebody else... it can lend you strength.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『…例えばここに、クーニャの笑顔の写真が張ってあるように、ね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛...For example, I have a picture of your smiling face here.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛...For example, I have a picture of your smiling face here.❜

MESSAGE.JP: ィンク一つして、女性はフライトジャケットの襟をめくってみせた。
MESSAGE.EN: She winked and turned over the collar of her flight jacket so we could see.
MESSAGE.Translation: She winked and turned over the collar of her flight jacket so we could see.

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『…では、いってきます』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛...Well, I'm heading out.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛...Well, I'm heading out.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 性は、きりりとした表情を作り、敬礼をした。
MESSAGE.EN: She put on a stiff expression and saluted.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put on a stiff expression and saluted.

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『“Jucunda memoria est praeteritorum malorum（災いも過ぎ去りし日には喜び）”』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛❝Jucunda memoria est praeteritorum malorum. (The memory of past troubles is pleasant.)❞❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛❝Jucunda memoria est praeteritorum malorum. (The memory of past troubles is pleasant.)❞❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『Куня, пока！（クーニャ、じゃあね！）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛Куня, пока!(Bye, Kunya!)❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛Куня, пока!(Bye, Kunya!)❜

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「おかぁ…さん…っ…うっ……うぅっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Mo.. ther.. Uu... uuu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Mo.. ther.. Uu... uuu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃくりあげるクドの肩を僕は引き寄せた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was sobbing so I pulled her to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was sobbing so I pulled her to me.

MESSAGE.JP: く、強く、力を込める。
MESSAGE.EN: I hugged her very, very tight.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hugged her very, very tight.

MESSAGE.JP: ろぽろ泣きながらも、クドは視線をそらさなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was crying like crazy, but she never took her eyes off the monitor.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was crying like crazy, but she never took her eyes off the monitor.

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『...Tolya, stop the recording. Yeah（トーリャ、録画もう止めて。うん）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛...Tolya, stop the recording. Yeah.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛...Tolya, stop the recording. Yeah.❜

MESSAGE.JP: ち上がり、心配そうな顔になりながら画面の外に話しかける女性。
MESSAGE.EN: The woman stood up with a worried look and spoke to someone off-screen.
MESSAGE.Translation: The woman stood up with a worried look and spoke to someone off-screen.

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『You think she can understand this?（これでわかってくれるかな？）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛You think she can understand this?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛You think she can understand this?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『...Yes, you're right. She will. Kunya is a smart girl（そうだね。クーニャは聡い子だから、きっとわかってくれる）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛...Yes, you're right. She will. Kunya is a smart girl.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛...Yes, you're right. She will. Kunya is a smart girl.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『...Tolya, aren't you going to record?（…トーリャは撮らないの？）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛...Tolya, aren't you going to record?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛...Tolya, aren't you going to record?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『We haven't got together for quite a while since we divorced, right？（私たちが揃うのは離婚以来ひさびさでしょ？）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛We haven't gotten together for quite a while since we divorced, right?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛We haven't gotten together for quite a while since we divorced, right?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『Well it's true you don't fly, Tolya（確かにトーリャは飛ばないものね）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛Well it's true you don't fly, Tolya.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛Well it's true you don't fly, Tolya.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『Oh this isn't fair（ずるいな）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛Oh this isn't fair.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛Oh this isn't fair.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『You're making me do all these embarrasing things alone（私だけこんな恥ずかしいことさせといて）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛'You're making me do all these embarrasing things alone.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛'You're making me do all these embarrasing things alone.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 像が乱れる。
MESSAGE.EN: The picture got fuzzy.
MESSAGE.Translation: The picture got fuzzy.

MESSAGE.JP: 画しているカメラを外しているのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: They probably put down the camera that was recording.
MESSAGE.Translation: They probably put down the camera that was recording.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『Cherusha! Can you come over please!（チルーシャ！　ちょっと来てくれ）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❛Cherusha! Can you come over, please!❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❛Cherusha! Can you come over, please!❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『Roger. Be right there!（了解。直ぐ行くから！）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛Roger. Be right there!❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛Roger. Be right there!❜

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『Dad, Tolya, take good care of the rest!（父さん、トーリャ、あとはよろしく！）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@❛Dad, Tolya, take good care of the rest!❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@❛Dad, Tolya, take good care of the rest!❜

MESSAGE.JP: 像はブルースクリーンとなった。
MESSAGE.EN: The picture went to a blue screen.
MESSAGE.Translation: The picture went to a blue screen.

MESSAGE.JP: ばらくＤＶＤの読み込み音だけが部屋に響く。
MESSAGE.EN: For a while the sound of the DVD being read was the only one in the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: For a while the sound of the DVD being read was the only one in the room.

MESSAGE.JP: ドは泣きながらテーブルの上を見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was crying and looking at something on the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was crying and looking at something on the table.

MESSAGE.JP: ートパソコンのそばに置いてあるもの。
MESSAGE.EN: There were some things next to the laptop.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were some things next to the laptop.

MESSAGE.JP: 学旅行前にクドが渡されたもの。
MESSAGE.EN: The things that Kud had been given before the school trip.
MESSAGE.Translation: The things that Kud had been given before the school trip.

MESSAGE.JP: ッグタグとロケットの欠片、そしてＤＶＤ。
MESSAGE.EN: Dog tags, a piece of a rocket, and a DVD.
MESSAGE.Translation: Dog tags, a piece of a rocket, and a DVD.

MESSAGE.JP: ＤＶＤは、おかあさんを見捨ててしまった、と思ったクドが怖くて再生できなかったもの。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Kud thought she'd abandoned her mother and had been too scared to play it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kud thought she'd abandoned her mother and had been too scared to play it.

MESSAGE.JP: ィスクの映像は、こんなにもクドへの想いに満ちている。
MESSAGE.EN: What was on the disc was filled with love for Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: What was on the disc was filled with love for Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: して、一通の手紙。
MESSAGE.EN: There was also a letter.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was also a letter.

MESSAGE.JP: の修学旅行の後に届いたクドのおじいさんからの手紙は、クドの安否を気遣っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a letter she'd received from her grandfather after the school trip, enquiring about her well-being.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a letter she'd received from her grandfather after the school trip, enquiring about her well-being.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「う…うぅ…うっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝U... uu... uu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝U... uu... uu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リキ…わた、私……いま……笑っていますか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Riki... am... I... smiling... right now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Riki... am... I... smiling... right now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わらって、いるでしょう、か……っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm smiling, right...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm smiling, right...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん。笑ってるよ、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah. You're smiling, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah. You're smiling, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「笑ってるから、泣いていいんだ。いいんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're smiling, so it's okay to cry. It's okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're smiling, so it's okay to cry. It's okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、でも、私、でも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Okay, but, I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Okay, but, I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は黙ってクドの頭を抱いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I said nothing and held her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said nothing and held her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドは、何になりたい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, what do you want to be?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, what do you want to be?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 元で出来るだけ優しく囁いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I whispered as softly as I could into her ear.
MESSAGE.Translation: I whispered as softly as I could into her ear.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…ぐすっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...*Sniffle*.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...*Sniffle*.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の好きな女の子は、泣きながら、笑いながら。
MESSAGE.EN: The girl I loved was crying and smiling at the same time.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl I loved was crying and smiling at the same time.

MESSAGE.JP: を涙でべとべとにしながら、それでも、だからこそ。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite, and partly because of, the tears she...
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite, and partly because of, the tears she...
